anya-e0501n0:3: Katamo hetupaccayo. Lobho hetupaccayo. Doso, moho, alobho, adoso, amoho hetu paccayo.
anya-e0501n0:4_0: Katame dhammā hetupaccayassa paccayuppannā. Lobha sahajātā cittacetasikā dhammā ca
anya-e0501n0:4_1: rūpakalāpādhammā ca dosasaha jātā mohasahajātā alobhasahajātā adosasaha jātā amohasahajātā
anya-e0501n0:4_2: cittacetasikā dhammā ca rūpakalāpā dhammā ca hetupaccayato uppannā hetupaccayuppannā dhammā.
anya-e0501n0:5_0: Sahajātarūpakalāpā nāma sahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe kammajarūpāni ca pavattikāle sahetukacittajarūpāni
anya-e0501n0:5_1: ca. Tattha paṭisandhikkhaṇo nāma paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇo. Pavattikālo nāma
anya-e0501n0:5_2: paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva cutikālaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0501n0:6_0: Kenaṭṭhena hetu, kenaṭṭhena paccayoti. Mūlaṭṭhena hetu, upakārakaṭṭhena paccayoti.
anya-e0501n0:6_1: Tattha mūlayamake vuttānaṃ lobhādīnaṃ mūladhammānaṃ mūlabhāvo mūlaṭṭho nāma. So mūlaṭṭho
anya-e0501n0:7_0: Api ca eko puriso ekissaṃ itthiyaṃ paṭibaddha citto hoti. So yāva taṃ cittaṃ na jahati,
anya-e0501n0:7_1: tāva taṃ itthiṃ ārabbha tassa purisassa lobhasahajātāni kāyavacīmanokammāni ca lobhasamuṭṭhitāni
anya-e0501n0:7_2: cittajarūpāni ca cirakālaṃpi pavattanti. Sabbāni ca tāni cittacetasikarūpāni tassaṃ
anya-e0501n0:7_3: itthiyaṃ rajjanalobhamūlakāni honti. So lobho tesaṃ mūlaṭṭhena hetu ca, upakārakaṭṭhena
anya-e0501n0:7_4: paccayo ca. Tasmā hetupaccayo. Esa nayo sesāni rajjanīyavatthūni ārabbharajjanavasena
anya-e0501n0:7_5: uppannesu lobhesu, dussanīyavatthūni ārabbha dussanavasena uppannesu dosesu, muyhanīyavatthūni
anya-e0501n0:8_0: Tattha yathā rukkhassa mūlāni sayaṃ antopathaviyaṃ suṭṭhu patiṭṭhahitvā pathavirasañca
anya-e0501n0:8_1: āporasañca gahetvā taṃ rukkhaṃ yāva aggā abhiharanti, tena rukkho cirakālaṃ vaḍḍhamāno
anya-e0501n0:8_2: tiṭṭhati. Tathā lobho ca tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vatthumhi rajjanavasena suṭṭhu patiṭṭhahitvā
anya-e0501n0:8_3: tassa tassa vatthussa piyarūparasañca sātarūparasañca gahetvā sampayuttadhamme yāva
anya-e0501n0:8_4: kāyavacīvītikkamā abhiharati, kāya vītikkamaṃ vā vacīvītikkamaṃ vā pāpeti. Tathā
anya-e0501n0:8_5: doso ca dussana vasena appiyarūparasañca asātarūparasañca gahetvā, moho ca muyhanavasena
anya-e0501n0:8_6: nānārammaṇesu niratthakacittācārarasaṃ vaḍḍhetvāti vattabbaṃ. Evaṃ abhiharantā tayo
anya-e0501n0:8_7: dhammā rajjanīyādīsu vatthūsu sampayuttadhamme modamāne pamodamāne karonto viya cira
anya-e0501n0:8_8: kālaṃ pavattenti. Sampayuttadhammā ca tathā pavattanti. Sampayutta dhammesu ca tathā
anya-e0501n0:8_9: pavattamānesu sahajātarūpakalāpāpi tathā pavattantiyeva. Tattha sampayuttadhamme
anya-e0501n0:8_10: abhiharatīti dve piyarūpa sātarūparase sampayuttadhammānaṃ santikaṃ pāpetīti attho.
anya-e0501n0:9_0: Sukkapakkhe so puriso yadākāmesu ādīnavaṃ passati, tadā so taṃ cittaṃjahati, taṃ
anya-e0501n0:9_1: itthiṃ ārabbha alobho sañjā yati. Pubbe yasmiṃ kāle taṃ itthiṃ ārabbha lobhamūlakāni
anya-e0501n0:9_2: asuddhāni kāyavacīmanokammāni vattanti. Idāni tasmiṃ kālepi alobhamūlakāni suddhāni
anya-e0501n0:9_3: kāyavacīmanokammāni vattanti. Pabbajita sīlasaṃvarāni vā jhānaparikammāni vā appanājhānāni
anya-e0501n0:9_4: vā vattanti. So alobho tesaṃ mūlaṭṭhena hetu ca hoti, upakārakaṭṭhena paccayoca.
anya-e0501n0:9_5: Tasmā hetupaccayo. Esa nayo sesesu lobha paṭipakkhesu alobhesu, dosapaṭipakkhesu
anya-e0501n0:10_0: Tattha rukkhamūlāni viya alobho lobhaneyyavatthūsu lobhaṃ pahāya lobhavivekasukharasaṃ
anya-e0501n0:10_1: vaḍḍhetvā tena sukhena sampayuttadhamme modamāne pamodamāne karonto viya yāva jhānasamāpattisukhā
anya-e0501n0:10_2: vā yāva maggaphalasukhā vā vaḍḍhāpeti. Tathā adoso ca dosaneyyavatthūsu dosavivekasukharasaṃ
anya-e0501n0:10_3: vaḍḍhetvā, amoho ca mohaneyyavatthūsu mohavivekasukharasaṃ vaḍḍhetvāti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0501n0:10_4: Evaṃ vaḍḍhāpentā tayo dhammā kusalesu dhammesu sampayuttadhamme modamāne pamodamāne
anya-e0501n0:10_5: karonto viya cira kālaṃpi pavattenti. Sampayuttadhammā ca tathā pavattanti. Sampayutta
anya-e0501n0:10_6: dhammesu ca tathā pavattamānesu sahajātarūpakalāpāpi tathā pavattantiyeva.
anya-e0501n0:11_0: Tattha lobhavivekasukharasanti viviccanaṃ vigamanaṃ viveko. Lobhassa viveko lobhaviveko.
anya-e0501n0:11_1: Lobhaviveke sukhaṃ lobhavivekasukhaṃ. Lobhavivekaṃ paṭicca uppannasukhanti vuttaṃ
anya-e0501n0:11_2: hoti. Tadeva raso lobhavivekasukharasoti samāso. Ayaṃ abhidhamme paṭṭhānanayo.
anya-e0501n0:12_0: Hattantanayo pana avijjāsaṅkhāto moho ca taṇhāsaṅkhāto lobho cāti dve dhammā sabbesaṃpi
anya-e0501n0:12_1: vaṭṭadukkhadhammānaṃ mūlāni honti. Doso pana lobhassa nissandabhūtaṃ pāpamūlaṃ hoti.
anya-e0501n0:12_2: Vijjāsaṅkhāto amoho ca nikkhamadhātusaṅkhāto alobho cāti dve dhammā vivaṭṭadhammānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:12_3: mūlāni honti. Adoso pana alobhassa nissandabhūtaṃ kalyāṇamūlaṃ hoti. Evaṃ chabbidhāni
anya-e0501n0:12_4: mūlāni sahajātānaṃpi asahajātānaṃpi nāmarūpadhammānaṃ paccayā hontīti. Ayaṃ suttantesu
anya-e0501n0:14_0: Katamo ārammaṇapaccayo. Sabbepi cittacetasikā dhammā sabbepi rūpadhammā sabbaṃpi
anya-e0501n0:14_1: nibbānaṃ sabbāpi paññattiyo ārammaṇa paccayo. Na hi so nāma ekopi dhammo atthi, yo
anya-e0501n0:14_2: citta cetasikānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na hoti. Saṅkhepato pana ārammaṇaṃ chabbidhaṃ hoti rūpārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0501n0:15_0: Katame dhammā ārammaṇapaccayassa paccayuppannā. Sabbepi citta cetasikādhammā ārammaṇapaccayassa
anya-e0501n0:15_1: paccayuppannā. Na hi kiñci cittaṃ nāma atthi, yaṃ cittaṃ bhūtena vā abhūtena vā ārammaṇena vinā pavattati.
anya-e0501n0:16_0: Tattha paccuppannaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ duvidhassa cakkhuviññāṇacittassa ārammaṇapaccayo.
anya-e0501n0:16_1: Paccuppannaṃ saddārammaṇaṃ duvidhassa sotaviññāṇa cittassa. Paccuppannaṃ gandhārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0501n0:16_2: duvidhassa ghānaviññāṇacittassa. Paccuppannaṃ rasārammaṇaṃ duvidhassa jithaviññāṇacittassa.
anya-e0501n0:16_3: Paccuppannaṃ tividhaṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ duvidhassa kāyaviññāṇacittassa. Paccuppannāni
anya-e0501n0:16_4: tāni pañcārammaṇāni tividhassa manodhātucittassa ārammaṇapaccayo. Sabbāni tāni atītānāgatapaccuppannāni
anya-e0501n0:16_5: pañcārammaṇāni vā sabbāni tekālikāni kālavimuttāni dhammārammaṇāni vā cha sattatividhānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:17: Kenaṭṭhena ārammaṇaṃ, kenaṭṭhena paccayoti. Citta cetasikehi ālambitabbaṭṭhena ārammaṇaṃ, upakārakaṭṭhena paccayoti.
anya-e0501n0:18: Ālambitabbaṭṭhenāti cettha ālambaṇakiriyā nāma citta cetasikānaṃ ārammaṇaggahaṇakiriyā, ārammaṇupādāna kiriyā.
anya-e0501n0:19_0: Yathā hi loke ayodhātuṃ kāmeti icchatīti atthena ayokantako nāma lohadhātuviseso
anya-e0501n0:19_1: atthi. So ayokhandhasamīpaṃ sampatto taṃ ayokhandhaṃ kāmento viya icchanto viya ayokhandhābhimukho
anya-e0501n0:19_2: cañcalati. Sayaṃ vā taṃ ayokhandhaṃ upagacchati. Ayokhandhaṃ vā attābhimukhaṃ ākaḍḍhati,
anya-e0501n0:19_3: ayokhandho tadabhimukho cañcalati, taṃ vā upagacchati. Ayaṃ ayokantakassa ālambaṇakiriyā
anya-e0501n0:19_4: nāma. Evameva cittacetasikānaṃ ārammaṇesu ālambaṇakiriyā daṭṭhabbā. Na kevalaṃ ārammaṇesu
anya-e0501n0:19_5: ālambaṇa mattaṃ hoti. Atha kho cittacetasikā dhammā sattasantāne uppajjamānā chasu
anya-e0501n0:19_6: dvāresu ārammaṇānaṃ āpātāgamane eva khaṇe khaṇe uppajjanti. Uppajjitvā ca khaṇe khaṇe nirujjhanti.
anya-e0501n0:20_0: Yathā taṃ bheritale bherisaddā uppajjamānā tattha tattha hatthena paharaṇakāle eva
anya-e0501n0:20_1: khaṇe khaṇe uppajjanti, uppajjitvā ca khaṇe khaṇe nirujjhanti. Vīṇāsaddā uppajjamānā
anya-e0501n0:20_2: vīṇātantīsu tattha tattha vīṇādantakena paharaṇakāle eva khaṇe khaṇe uppajjanti,
anya-e0501n0:20_3: uppajjitvā ca khaṇe khaṇe nirujjhantīti. Niddāyantassa bhavaṅgacittappavatti kālepi
anya-e0501n0:20_4: pubbabhave maraṇāsannakāle chasu dvāresu āpāta māgatāni kamma kammanimitta gatinimittāni
anya-e0501n0:22_0: Duvidho adhipatipaccayo ārammaṇādhipatipaccayo saha jātādhipatipaccayo ca. Tattha
anya-e0501n0:22_1: katamo ārammaṇādhipatipaccayo. Ārammaṇapaccaye vuttesu ārammaṇesu yāni ārammaṇāni
anya-e0501n0:22_2: atiiṭṭhāni honti atikantāni atimanāpāni garukatāni. Tāni ārammaṇāni ārammaṇādhipatipaccayo.
anya-e0501n0:22_3: Tattha atiiṭṭhānīti sabhāvato iṭṭhāni vā hontu aniṭṭhāni vā, tena tena puggalena
anya-e0501n0:23_0: Tāni pana dhammato dve dosamūlacittuppāde ca dve momūha cittuppāde ca dukkhasahagatakāyaviññāṇacittuppāde
anya-e0501n0:23_1: ca ṭhapetvā avasesāni sabbāni kāmāvacaracittacetasikāni ca rūpārūpa lokuttaracittacetasikāni
anya-e0501n0:24_0: Tesupi kāmārammaṇāni garuṃ karontasseva ārammaṇā dhipatipaccayo. Garuṃ akarontassa
anya-e0501n0:24_1: ārammaṇādhipatipaccayo na hoti. Jhānalābhino pana attanā paṭiladdhāni mahaggatajhānāni
anya-e0501n0:24_2: ariyasāvakā ca attanā paṭiladdhe lokuttaradhamme garuṃ akarontā nāma natthi.
anya-e0501n0:25_0: Katame dhammā tassa paccayassa paccayuppannā. Aṭṭha lobha mūlacittāni aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacittāni
anya-e0501n0:25_1: cattāri kāmāvacara ñāṇasampayuttakiriyacittāni aṭṭha lokuttaracittāni tassa paccayassa paccayuppannā.
anya-e0501n0:26_0: Tattha lokiyāni chaḷārammaṇāni lobhamūlacittānaṃ paccayo. Sattarasa lokiyakusalāni
anya-e0501n0:26_1: catunnaṃ ñāṇavippayutta kusalānaṃ. Tāni kusalāniceva heṭṭhimamaggaphalāni ca nibbānañca
anya-e0501n0:26_2: catunnaṃ ñāṇasampayuttakusalānaṃ. Arahattamaggaphalāni ca nibbānañca catunnaṃ ñāṇasampayuttakiriyānaṃ.
anya-e0501n0:27_0: Kenaṭṭhena ārammaṇaṃ, kenaṭṭhena adhipati. Ālambi tabbaṭṭhena ārammaṇaṃ, ādhipaccaṭṭhena
anya-e0501n0:27_1: adhipati. Ko ādhipaccaṭṭho. Attānaṃ garuṃ katvā pavattesu cittacetasikesu issarabhāvo
anya-e0501n0:27_2: ādhipaccaṭṭho. Loke sāmikā viya ārammaṇādhipatipaccaya dhammā daṭṭhabbā, dāsā viya
anya-e0501n0:28_0: Sutasomajātake rājā porisādo manussamaṃsaṃ garuṃ karonto manussamaṃsahetu rajjaṃ
anya-e0501n0:28_1: pahāya araññe vicarati. Tattha manussamaṃse gandharasa dhammā ārammaṇādhipatipaccayo.
anya-e0501n0:28_2: Rañño porisādassa lobhamūlacittaṃ paccayuppannadhammo. Rājā suta somo saccadhammaṃ
anya-e0501n0:28_3: garuṃ katvā saccadhammahetu rajjasampattiñca ñāti saṅghañca attano jīvitañca chaṭṭetvā
anya-e0501n0:28_4: puna rañño porisādassa hatthaṃ upagato. Tattha saccadhammo ārammaṇādhipatipaccayo.
anya-e0501n0:28_5: Rañño sutasomassa kusalacittaṃ paccayuppannadhammo. Esanayo sabbesu garukatesu ārammaṇesu.
anya-e0501n0:29: Katamo sahajātādhipatipaccayo. Adhipatibhāvaṃ pattā cattāro dhammā adhipatipaccayo, chando cittaṃ vīriyaṃ vīmaṃsā.
anya-e0501n0:30: Katame dhammā tassa paccayassa paccayuppannā. Adhipati sampayuttā cittacetasikā ca adhipatisamuṭṭhitā cittajarūpadhammā ca tassa paccayassa paccayuppannā.
anya-e0501n0:32_0: Sahuppādanaṭṭhena sahajāto, sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena adhipati. Tattha
anya-e0501n0:32_1: sahuppādanaṭṭhenāti yo dhammo sayaṃ uppajjamāno attanā sahajātadhamme ca attanā saheva
anya-e0501n0:33_0: Abhibhavanaṭṭhenāti ajjhottharaṇaṭṭhena. Yathā rājā cakkavatti attano puññiddhiyā
anya-e0501n0:33_1: sakaladīpavāsino abhibhavanto ajjhottharanto attano vase vattāpeti, sakaladīpavāsino
anya-e0501n0:33_2: ca tassa vase vattanti. Tathā adhipatiṭṭhānapattā ime cattāro dhammā attano attano
anya-e0501n0:33_3: visaye sahajātadhamme abhibhavantā ajjhottharantā attano vase vattāpenti, sahajātadhammā
anya-e0501n0:33_4: ca tesaṃ vase vattanti. Yathā vā silāthambhe pathavidhātu udakakkhandhe āpodhātu
anya-e0501n0:33_5: aggikkhandhe tejodhātu vātakkhandhe vāyodhātu attanā sahajātā tisso dhātuyo abhibhavantā
anya-e0501n0:33_6: ajjhottharantā attano gatiṃ gamāpenti, sahajātadhātuyo ca tāsaṃ gatiṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0501n0:33_7: evameva adhipatiṭṭhānapattā ime cattāro dhammā attano balena sahajātadhamme attano
anya-e0501n0:33_8: gatiṃ gamāpenti, sahajātadhammā ca tesaṃ gatiṃ gacchanti, evaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena.
anya-e0501n0:34_0: Ettha vadeyyuṃ, yadi sahajātadhammānaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena adhipatināma siyā. Evaṃ
anya-e0501n0:34_1: sati tiṭṭhatu chando, lobho eva adhipatināma siyā, so hi chandatopi balavataro hutvā
anya-e0501n0:34_2: saha jātadhamme abhibhavanto pavattatīti. Vuccate, bālaputhujjanesu eva lobho chandato
anya-e0501n0:34_3: balavataro hoti, paṇḍitesu pana chando eva lobhato balavataro hutvā sahajātadhamme
anya-e0501n0:34_4: abhi bhavanto pavattati. Sace hi lobho eva chandato balavataro siyā, kathaṃ ime sattā
anya-e0501n0:34_5: lobhassa hatthagatā bhavasampatti bhogasammattiyo chaṭṭetvā nekkhammadhamme pūretvā
anya-e0501n0:34_6: vaṭṭadukkhato nissareyyuṃ. Yasmā pana chando eva lobhato balavataro hoti, tasmā ime
anya-e0501n0:34_7: sattā lobhassa hatthagatā bhavasampatti bhogasampattiyo chaṭṭetvā nekkhammadhamme
anya-e0501n0:34_8: pūretvā vaṭṭadukkhato nissaranti. Tasmā chando eva lobhato balavataro hoti, chando
anya-e0501n0:34_9: eva adhipati, na lobhoti. Esa nayo dosādīsupīti.
anya-e0501n0:35: Tattha loke mahantesu sudukkaresu purisakammesu paccupaṭṭhitesu ime cattāro dhammā kammasiddhiyā saṃvattanti. Kathaṃ.
anya-e0501n0:36_0: Hīnacchandā bahujjanā mahantāni sudukkarāni purisakammāni disvā nivattacchandā honti.
anya-e0501n0:36_1: Kātuṃ na icchanti, amhākaṃ avisayoti nirapekkhā ṭhapenti. Chandādhiko pana tādisāni
anya-e0501n0:36_2: purisakammāni disvā uggatacchando hoti, ativiya kātuṃ icchati, mama visayo esoti
anya-e0501n0:36_3: adhiṭṭhānaṃ gacchati. So chandena abhikaḍḍhito yāva taṃ kammaṃ na sijjhati, tāva
anya-e0501n0:36_4: antarā taṃ kammaṃ chaṭṭetuṃ na sakkoti. Evañca sati atimahantaṃpi taṃ kammaṃ ekasmiṃ
anya-e0501n0:37_0: Hīnavīriyā ca bahujjanā tādisāni kammāni disvā nivatta vīriyā honti, idaṃ me kammaṃ
anya-e0501n0:37_1: karontassa bahuṃ kāyadukkhaṃ vā cetodukkhaṃ vā bhavissatīti nivattanti. Vīriyādhiko
anya-e0501n0:37_2: pana tādisāni purisakammāni disvā uggatavīriyo hoti, idāneva uṭṭhahitvā kātuṃ icchati.
anya-e0501n0:37_3: So cirakālaṃpi taṃ kammaṃ karonto bahuṃ kāyadukkhaṃ vā cetodukkhaṃ vā anubhavantopi
anya-e0501n0:37_4: tasmiṃ vīriya kamme nanibbindati, mahantena kammavīriyena vinā bhavituṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0501n0:37_5: tādisena vīriyena rattidivaṃ khepento cittasukhaṃ vindati. Evañca sati atimahantaṃpi
anya-e0501n0:37_6: taṃ kammaṃ ekasmiṃ kāle siddhaṃ bhavissati.
anya-e0501n0:38_0: Hīnacittā ca bahujjanā tādisāni kammāni disvā nivattacittā honti. Puna ārammaṇaṃpi
anya-e0501n0:38_1: na karonti. Cittādhiko pana tādisāni kammāni disvā uggatacitto hoti, cittaṃ vinodetuṃpi
anya-e0501n0:38_2: na sakkoti, niccakālaṃ tattha nibandhacitto hoti. So cittavasiko hutvā cirakālaṃpi
anya-e0501n0:38_3: taṃ kammaṃ karonto bahuṃ kāyadukkhaṃvāpītiādinā chandādhipatinayena vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0501n0:39_0: Mandapaññā ca bahujjanā tādisāni kammāni disvā nivattapaññā honti, kammānaṃ ādimpi
anya-e0501n0:39_1: na passanti, antapi na passanti, andhakāre pavisantā viya honti, tāni kammāni kātuṃ
anya-e0501n0:39_2: cittaṃpi na namati. Paññādhiko pana tādisāni kammāni disvā uggatapañño hoti, kammānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:39_3: ādiṃpi passati, antaṃpi passati, phalaṃpi passati, ānisaṃsaṃpi passati. Sukhena kammasiddhiyā
anya-e0501n0:39_4: nānāupāyaṃpi passati. So cirakālaṃpi taṃ kammaṃ karontotiādinā vīriyādhipatinayena
anya-e0501n0:39_5: vattabbaṃ. Idha pana mahatiyā kammavīmaṃsāyāti ca tādisiyā kamma vīmaṃsāyāti ca vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0501n0:40_0: Evaṃ loke mahantesu sudukkaresu purisakammesu paccupaṭṭhitesu ime cattāro dhammā
anya-e0501n0:40_1: kammasiddhiyā saṃvattanti. Imesañca catunnaṃ adhipatīnaṃ vijjamānattā loke purisavisesā
anya-e0501n0:40_2: nāma dissanti, sabbaññubuddhā nāma dissanti, sabbaññubodhisattā nāma dissanti, paccekabuddhā
anya-e0501n0:40_3: nāma dissanti, paccekabodhisattānāma dissanti, aggasāvakānāma mahāsāvakā nāma sāvakabodhisattā
anya-e0501n0:40_4: nāma dissanti. Lokepi evarūpānaṃ purisavisesānaṃ vasena satta lokassa atthāya hitāya
anya-e0501n0:40_5: sukhāya paññāsippavisesā ca paribhogavatthuvisesā ca dissantīti. Adhipatipaccayadīpanā niṭṭhitā.
anya-e0501n0:42: Katamo anantarapaccayo. Anantare khaṇe niruddho citta cetasikadhammasamūho anantarapaccayo.
anya-e0501n0:43: Katamo dhammo anantarapaccayassa paccayuppanno. Pacchime anantare eva khaṇe uppanno cittacetasikadhammasamūho tassa paccayassa paccayuppanno.
anya-e0501n0:44: Ekasmiṃ bhave paṭisandhicittaṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgacittassa anantara paccayo, paṭhama bhavaṅgacittaṃ dutiyabhavaṅgacittassa anantarapaccayotiādinā vattabbo.
anya-e0501n0:45_0: Yadā pana dhammayamake suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye akusale citte vattamāneti vuttanayena
anya-e0501n0:45_1: tassa sattassa attano abhinavaṃ attabhāvaṃ ārabbha etaṃ mama esohamasmi eso me attāti
anya-e0501n0:45_2: pavattaṃ bhavanikantika taṇhāsahagatacittaṃ uppajjati. Tadā paṭhamaṃ dvikkhattuṃ
anya-e0501n0:45_3: bhavaṅgaṃ calati. Tato manodvārāvajjanacittaṃ uppajjati. Tato satta bhavanikantikajavanāni
anya-e0501n0:46_0: Api ca so satto tadā paccuppannabhave kiñci na jānāti, pubbabhave attanā anubhūtaṃ
anya-e0501n0:46_1: ārammaṇaṃ anussaramāno acchati. Vatthussa pana atidubbalattā tañca ārammaṇaṃ aparibyattameva
anya-e0501n0:46_2: hoti. Taṃ ārabbha uddhaccasahagatacittameva bahulaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0501n0:47_0: Yadā gabbho thokaṃ vaḍḍhamāno hoti atirekadvemāsaṃ gato, tadā cakkhādīni indriyāni
anya-e0501n0:47_1: paripuṇṇāni honti. Evaṃ santepi mātugabbhe ālokādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ abhāvato cakkhuviññāṇādīni
anya-e0501n0:47_2: cattāri viññāṇāni nuppajjanti, kāyaviññāṇamanoviññāṇāni eva uppajjanti. So satto
anya-e0501n0:47_3: mātuyā iriyāpathaparivattanādīsu bahūni dukkhadomanassāni paccanubhoti. Vijāyanakāle
anya-e0501n0:47_4: pana bhusaṃ dukkhaṃ nigacchatiyeva. Vijāyitvāpi yāva vatthurūpāni mudūni honti, paripākaṃ
anya-e0501n0:47_5: na gacchanti, tāva so atimandarūpo uttānaseyyako hutvā acchati. Na kiñci paccuppannaṃ
anya-e0501n0:47_6: ārammaṇaṃ sallakkheti. Yebhuyyena purima bhavānusārī eva tassa viññāṇaṃ hoti. Sace
anya-e0501n0:47_7: so niraya bhavato āgato hoti, so virūpamukhabahulo hoti. Purimāni nirayārammaṇāni
anya-e0501n0:47_8: ārabbha khaṇe khaṇe virūpamukhamassa paññāyati. Atha devalokato āgato hoti, dibbāni
anya-e0501n0:47_9: ārammaṇāni ārabbha vippasannamukhabahulo hoti, khaṇe khaṇe mihitamukhamassa paññāyati.
anya-e0501n0:48_0: Yadā pana vatthurūpāni tikkhāni honti, paripākaṃ gacchanti. Viññāṇāni cassa suvisadāni
anya-e0501n0:48_1: pavattanti. Tadā amandarūpo hutvā kīḷanto līḷanto modanto pamodanto acchati. Paccuppanne
anya-e0501n0:48_2: ārammaṇāni sallakkheti. Mātubhāsaṃ sallakkheti. Idha lokānusārī viññāṇamassa bahulaṃ
anya-e0501n0:49_0: Kiṃ pana sabbopi satto imasmiṃ ṭhāne eva purimaṃ jātiṃ pamussatīti ce. Na sabbopi
anya-e0501n0:49_1: satto imasmiṃ ṭhāne eva pamussati. Koci atirekataraṃ gambhavāsadukkhena paripīḷito
anya-e0501n0:49_2: gabbhe eva pamussati. Koci vijāyanakāle, koci imasmiṃ ṭhāne pamussati. Koci itoparampi
anya-e0501n0:49_3: daharakāle na pamussati. Vuḍḍhakāle eva pamussati. Koci yāvajīvaṃpi na pamussati.
anya-e0501n0:49_4: Dve tayo bhave anussarantopi atthiyeva. Ime jātissarasattā nāma honti.
anya-e0501n0:50_0: Tattha vijāyanakālato paṭṭhāya chadvārikavīthicittāni pavattanti. Paccuppannārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0501n0:50_1: sallakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya chadvārikavīthi cittāni paripuṇṇāni pavattanti. Sabbatthapi
anya-e0501n0:50_2: purimaṃ purimaṃ anantare niruddhaṃ cittaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa anantare uppannassa
anya-e0501n0:50_3: cittassa anantara paccayo hoti. Ayañca anantarapaccayo nāma anamatagge saṃsāre ekassa
anya-e0501n0:50_4: sattassa ekappabandho eva hoti. Yadā satto arahatta maggaṃ labhitvā khandhaparinibbānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:50_5: pāpuṇāti, tadā eva so pabandho chijjati.
anya-e0501n0:51_0: Kenaṭṭhena anantaro, kenaṭṭhena paccayoti. Attano anantare attasadisassa dhammantarassa
anya-e0501n0:51_1: uppādanaṭṭhena anantaro, upakārakaṭṭhena paccayo. Tattha attasadisassāti sārammaṇa
anya-e0501n0:51_2: bhāvena attanā sadisassa. Sārammaṇabhāvenāti ca yo dhammo ārammaṇena vinā na pavattati,
anya-e0501n0:51_3: so sārammaṇo nāma, evaṃ sārammaṇabhāvena. Dhammantarassa uppādanaṭṭhenāti purimasmiṃ
anya-e0501n0:51_4: citte niruddhepi tassa cintanakiriyāvego na vūpasammati, pacchimaṃ cittaṃ uppādetvā
anya-e0501n0:51_5: eva vūpasammati, evaṃ pacchimassa dhammantarassa uppādanaṭṭhena.
anya-e0501n0:52_0: Tattha purimā purimā mātuparamparā viya anantarapaccayaparamparā daṭṭhabbā. Pacchimā
anya-e0501n0:52_1: pacchimā dhītuparamparā viya tassa paccayuppannaparamparā daṭṭhabbā. Evaṃ sante arahantānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:52_2: sabbapacchimaṃ parinibbānacittampi puna paṭisandhicittasaṅkhātaṃ dhammantaraṃ uppādeyyāti.
anya-e0501n0:52_3: Na uppādeyya. Kasmā, tadā kammakilesavegānaṃ sabbaso paṭippassaddhibhāvena accantasantatarattā
anya-e0501n0:54: Paccayadhammavibhāgo ca paccayuppannadhammavibhāgo ca anantapaccaya sadiso.
anya-e0501n0:55_0: Kenaṭṭhena samanantaroti. Suṭṭhu anantaraṭṭhena samanantaro. Yathā silāthambhādīsu
anya-e0501n0:55_1: rūpakalāpā ekābaddhā samānāpi rūpa dhammabhāvena saṇṭhāna jātikattā majjhe paricchedarūpasahitā
anya-e0501n0:55_2: eva honti. Dvinnaṃ rūpakalāpānaṃ majjhe antaraṃ nāma vivaraṃ nāma atthiyeva. Na tathā
anya-e0501n0:55_3: purimapacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ cittacetasika kalāpānaṃ majjhe. Te pana arūpadhammabhāvena
anya-e0501n0:55_4: asaṇṭhāna jātikattā majjhe paricchedadhammassa nāma kassaci ākāsavivarassa abhāvato
anya-e0501n0:55_5: sabbaso antara rahitā eva honti. Lokassapi dvinnaṃ kalāpānaṃ antaraṃ nāma na dissati.
anya-e0501n0:55_6: Tato ime sattā cittaṃ nāma niccaṃ dhuvaṃ thāvaraṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti evaṃ citte
anya-e0501n0:55_7: niccasaññino honti. Evaṃ suṭṭhu anantaraṭṭhena samanantaro. Anantaraṭṭhenāti ca attano
anya-e0501n0:55_8: anantare attasadisassa dhammantarassa uppādanaṭṭhenāti pubbe vuttameva.
anya-e0501n0:56_0: Evaṃ sante nirodhasamāpattikāle purimacittaṃ nāma neva saññānāsaññāyatanacittaṃ,
anya-e0501n0:56_1: pacchimacittaṃ nāma ariyaphalacittaṃ, dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ antare ekarattidivampi dverattidivānipi.La.
anya-e0501n0:56_2: Sattarattidivānipi acittako hoti. Asaññasattabhūmiyaṃpi purime kāmabhave cuticittaṃ
anya-e0501n0:56_3: purimacittaṃ nāma. Pacchime kāmabhave paṭisandhicittaṃ pacchimacittaṃ nāma, dvinnaṃ
anya-e0501n0:56_4: cittānaṃ antare asaññasattabhave pañcakappasatāni puggalo acittako tiṭṭhati. Tattha
anya-e0501n0:56_5: dve purimacittāni attano anantare attasadisassa dhammantarassa uppādanapaccayasattirahitāni
anya-e0501n0:56_6: hontīti. Na honti. Mahantehi pana bhāvanāpaṇidhibalehi paṭibāhitattā purimacittāni
anya-e0501n0:56_7: ca nirujjhamānāni anantare dhammantarassa uppādana sattisahitāni eva nirujjhanti.
anya-e0501n0:56_8: Pacchimacittāni ca uppajjamānāni tasmiṃ khaṇe ekābaddhabhāvena anuppajjitvā cirakāle
anya-e0501n0:56_9: eva uppajjanti. Na ca ettakamattena purimacittānaṃ anantare dhammantarassa uppādana
anya-e0501n0:56_10: sattināma natthīti ca, te anantarapaccayadhammā nāma na hontīti ca sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0501n0:56_11: Yathā taṃ rañño yodhā nāma atthi, kadāci rājā kālaṃ ñatvā tumhe idāni māyujjhatha,
anya-e0501n0:56_12: yuddhakālo na hoti, asukasmiṃ kāle eva yujjhathāti vadeyya. Te ca tadā ayujjhamānā
anya-e0501n0:56_13: vicareyyuṃ. Evaṃ santepi tesaṃ yujjhanasatti nāma natthīti ca, te yodhā nāma na hontīti
anya-e0501n0:57_0: Ettha vadeyyuṃ, imasmiṃ paccaye te pana arūpadhammabhāvena asaṇṭhāna jātikattā majjheparicchedadhammassa
anya-e0501n0:57_1: nāma kassaci abhāvato sabbaso antararahitā eva hontīti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sante pubbe ārammaṇa
anya-e0501n0:57_2: paccaye bherisaddavīṇāsaddopamāhi yo cittānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe uppādo ca nirodho ca vutto,
anya-e0501n0:57_3: so amhehi kathaṃ paccetabboti. Aññamaññaviruddhānaṃ nānācittānaṃ khaṇamattepi pubbāpara
anya-e0501n0:57_4: parivattanassa loke paññāyanato. Ayamattho pubbe citta yamakadīpaniyaṃ vitthārato
anya-e0501n0:59_0: Paccayadhammavibhāgo ca paccayuppannadhammavibhāgoca vuccati. Ekato uppannā sabbepi
anya-e0501n0:59_1: cittacetasikā dhammā aññamaññaṃ sahajāta paccayā ca honti sahajātapaccayuppannā ca.
anya-e0501n0:59_2: Paṭisandhināmakkhandhā ca paṭisandhisahajātaṃ hadayavatthu ca aññamaññaṃ sahajātapaccayā
anya-e0501n0:59_3: ca honti sahajātapaccayuppannā ca. Sabbāni mahābhūtānipi aññamaññaṃ sahajātapaccayā
anya-e0501n0:59_4: ca honti paccayuppannadhammā ca. Paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe sabbāni kammajarūpāni
anya-e0501n0:59_5: ca pavattikāle tassa tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tena tena cittena jātāni sabbāni
anya-e0501n0:59_6: cittajarūpāni ca sahajātacittassa paccayuppannāni nāma. Sabbāni upādārūpāni sahajātamahābhūtānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:60_0: Kenaṭṭhena sahajāto, kenaṭṭhena paccayo. Saha jānanaṭṭhena sahajāto, upakārakaṭṭhena
anya-e0501n0:60_1: paccayo. Tattha sahajānanaṭṭhenāti yo dhammo jāyamāno attano paccayuppannehi dhammehi
anya-e0501n0:60_2: saheva sayañca jāyati uppajjati, attano paccayuppanne ca dhamme attanā saheva janeti
anya-e0501n0:60_3: uppādeti, tassa so attho sahajānanaṭṭho nāma.
anya-e0501n0:61_0: Yathā sūriyo nāma udayanto sūriyātape ca sūriyā loke ca attanā saheva janayanto udeti.
anya-e0501n0:61_1: Yathā ca padīpo nāma jalanto padīpātape ca padīpāloke ca attanā saheva janayanto
anya-e0501n0:61_2: jalati. Evamevaṃ ayaṃ paccayadhammo uppajjamāno attano paccayuppannadhamme attanā
anya-e0501n0:61_3: saheva uppādeti. Tattha sūriyo viya ekameko nāma dhammo, sūriyātapā viya taṃsampayuttadhammā,
anya-e0501n0:61_4: sūriyālokā viya sahajātarūpadhammā. Tathā sūriyo viya ekameko mahābhūtarūpadhammo,
anya-e0501n0:61_5: sūriyātapā viya sahajātamahābhūtadhammā, sūriyālokā viya sahajātaupādārūpadhammā,
anya-e0501n0:63_0: Sahajātapaccaye vibhattesu dhammesu yo yo paccaya dhammoti vutto, so so eva idha
anya-e0501n0:63_1: paccayadhammo ceva paccayuppanna dhammo ca hoti. Sabbepi cittacetasikā dhammā aññamaññassa
anya-e0501n0:63_2: paccayadhammā ca honti aññamaññassa paccayuppannadhammā. Sahajātā cattāro mahābhūtā
anya-e0501n0:63_3: aññamaññassa paccayadhammā ca honti aññamaññassa paccayuppannadhammā ca. Paṭisandhināmakkhandhā
anya-e0501n0:63_4: ca paṭisandhi sahajātaṃ hadayavatthurūpañca aññamaññassa paccayadhammā ca honti aññamaññassa
anya-e0501n0:64_0: Yathā aññamaññaṃ nissāya ussāpitā tayo daṇḍā aññamaññassa nissayā ca honti, aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0501n0:64_1: nissitā ca. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ussite sabbe ussitā honti, ekamekasmiṃ patante sabbe
anya-e0501n0:65_0: Ettha vadeyyuṃ, sabbe cetasikā dhammā cittapaccayaṃ alabha mānā uppajjituṃ na sakkontīti
anya-e0501n0:65_1: yuttaṃ. Kasmā. Phusanādīnaṃ cetasika kiccānaṃ vijānanakiccapubbaṅgamattā, manopubbaṅgamāti
anya-e0501n0:65_2: hi vuttaṃ. Cittaṃ pana cetasikapaccayaṃ alabhamānaṃ uppajjituṃ na sakkotīti na yujjeyyāti.
anya-e0501n0:65_3: Vuccate, cetasikadhammā nāma cittassa sahāyaṅgāni honti. Tasmā tehi vinā cittampi
anya-e0501n0:65_4: uppajjituṃ na sakkotiyeva. Eseva nayo catūsu mahābhūtesupīti. Upādārūpāni pana mahābhūtānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:65_5: nissandamattattā sahāyaṅgāni na hontīti. Nanu āhārarūpañca jīvitarūpañca paccayavisesattā
anya-e0501n0:65_6: sahāyaṅgaṃ hotīti. Vuccate, ṭhitiyā eva sahāyaṅgaṃ hoti. Na uppāde. Idha pana uppāde
anya-e0501n0:67: Tividho nissayapaccayo, sahajātanissayo vatthu purejātanissayo vatthārammaṇapurejātanissayo.
anya-e0501n0:68: Tattha katamo sahajātanissayo. Sabbo sahajāta paccayo sahajātanissayo. Tasmā tattha paccayavibhāgo ca paccayuppannavibhāgo ca sahajātapaccaye vuttanayena veditabbo.
anya-e0501n0:69_0: Katamo pana vatthupurejātanissayo. Cha vatthūni cakkhu vatthu sotavatthu ghānavatthu
anya-e0501n0:69_1: jithavatthu kāyavatthu hadayavatthu. Imāni chavatthūni pavattikāle sattānaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ
anya-e0501n0:70_0: Vatthurūpameva purejātaṃ hutvā nissayo vatthupurejāta nissayo. Tattha cittacetasikānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:70_1: nissayaṭṭhānaṭṭhena vatthu nāma. Purejātanti attano attano paccayuppannassa dhammassa
anya-e0501n0:71_0: Tattha paṭisandhicittaṃ tadā purejātassa vatthurūpassa abhāvato attanā sahuppannameva
anya-e0501n0:71_1: hadayavatthurūpaṃ nissāya uppajjati. Paṭhama bhavaṅgacittaṃ pana paṭisandhicittena
anya-e0501n0:71_2: sahuppannahadaya vatthurūpaṃ nissāya uppajjati. Dutiyabhavaṅgacittaṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgacittena
anya-e0501n0:71_3: sahuppannaṃ nissāya uppajjati. Evaṃ tatiyabhavaṅgacittaṃ dutiya bhavaṅgacittena sahuppannantiādinā
anya-e0501n0:72_0: Yathā vīṇāsaddā nāma vīṇātantīsu vīṇādaṇḍakehi paharaṇavegena eva jāyanti, no aññathā.
anya-e0501n0:72_1: Tathā pañcaviññāṇāni nāma pañcavatthusaṅkhātesu pañcadvāresu pañcannaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:72_2: āpātā gamanavegena eva jāyanti, no aññathā.
anya-e0501n0:73_0: Āpātāgamanañca tesaṃ dvārārammaṇānaṃ ṭhitipattakāle eva hoti. Āpātāgamanapaccayā
anya-e0501n0:73_1: ca dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅgaṃ calati. Bhavaṅgacalana paccayā ca āvajjanaṃ uppajjati. Āvajjanapaccayā
anya-e0501n0:73_2: ca tāni pañcaviññāṇāni uppajjanti. Tasmā cakkhādīni pañcavatthūni pure atītabhavaṅgacittassa
anya-e0501n0:73_3: uppādakkhaṇe uppannāni eva pañcaviññāṇadhātūnaṃ vatthupurejātapaccayā honti.
anya-e0501n0:74_0: Maraṇāsannakāle pana sabbāni cha vatthūni cuticittato pure sattarasamassa bhavaṅgacittassa
anya-e0501n0:74_1: uppādakkhaṇe eva uppajjanti, tato paraṃ na uppajjanti. Tasmā maraṇāsannakāle bhavaṅgacittāni
anya-e0501n0:74_2: ca sabbāni chadvārikavīthicittāni ca cuticittañca puretaraṃ uppannāni tāniyeva attano
anya-e0501n0:74_3: attano vatthūni nissāya uppajjanti. Ayaṃ vatthupurejāta nissayo.
anya-e0501n0:75_0: Katamo pana vatthārammaṇapurejātanissayo. Yadā attano ajjhattaṃ vatthurūpaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0501n0:75_1: yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya mama manoviññāṇaṃ vattati, etaṃ mama eso hamasmi eso me attāti
anya-e0501n0:75_2: evaṃ taṇhāmāna diṭṭhīhi gahaṇavasena vā etaṃ aniccaṃ etaṃ dukkhaṃ etaṃ anattāti evaṃ
anya-e0501n0:75_3: sammasanavasena vā āvajjanādīni manodvārikavīthi cittāni pavattanti. Tadā taṃ taṃ
anya-e0501n0:75_4: vatthurūpaṃ paccekaṃ tesaṃ nissayavatthu ca hoti tesaṃ ārammaṇañca. Tasmā taṃ taṃ
anya-e0501n0:75_5: hadayarūpaṃ tassa tassa cittuppādassa vatthārammaṇapurejātapaccayo hoti. Ayaṃ vatthārammaṇa
anya-e0501n0:76_0: Idha suttantanissayopi vattabbo. Ime manussā vā tiracchānagatā vā rukkhādayo vā mahāpathaviyaṃ
anya-e0501n0:76_1: patiṭṭhitā, mahā pathavī ca heṭṭhā mahāudakakkhandhe, mahāudakakkhandho ca heṭṭhā
anya-e0501n0:76_2: mahāvātakkhandhe, mahāvātakkhandho ca heṭṭhā ajaṭākāse, manussā gehesu, bhikkhū vihāresu,
anya-e0501n0:76_3: devā dibbavimānesūtiādinā sabbaṃ lokappavattiṃ ñatvā nissayapaccayo veditabbo. Nissayapaccayadīpanā niṭṭhitā.
anya-e0501n0:78: Tividho upanissayapaccayo, ārammaṇūpanissayo anantarūpanissayo pakatūpanissayo. Tattha ārammaṇūpa nissayo ārammaṇādhipatipaccayasadiso, anantarūpanissayo anantarapaccayasadiso.
anya-e0501n0:79_0: Katamo pakatūpanissayo. Sabbepi atītānāgata paccuppannā ajjhattabahiddhābhūtā cittacetasikarūpadhammā
anya-e0501n0:79_1: ca nibbānañca paññatti ca sabbesaṃ paccuppannānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ yathārahaṃ pakatūpanissayo.
anya-e0501n0:80_0: Tattha atīto parinibbuto amhākaṃ buddho ca dhammo ca ariyasāvakasaṅgho ca sammutisaṅghaparamparā
anya-e0501n0:80_1: ca amhākaṃ pacchima janānaṃ kusaluppattiyā pakatūpanissayapaccayo. Tathā loke atītā
anya-e0501n0:80_2: kālaṅkatā mātāpitaro ca ācariyā ca paṇḍitasamaṇabrāhmaṇā ca pākaṭā nānātitthācariyā
anya-e0501n0:80_3: ca mahiddhikā mahānubhāvā porāṇakarājāno ca pacchimakānaṃ janānaṃ kusaluppattiyā
anya-e0501n0:80_4: vā akusaluppattiyā vā sukhadukkhuppattiyā vā pakatūpanissayo. Tathā hi te pacchimakānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:80_5: janānaṃ atthāya nānāsaddhammapaññattiyo vā nānāasaddhammapaññattiyo vā nānālokūpakaraṇāni
anya-e0501n0:80_6: vā pure paṭṭhapesuṃ. Pacchimajanā ca tehi paṭṭhapitesu dānasīlādidhammesu vā lokacāritta
anya-e0501n0:80_7: kulagottacāritta dhammesu vā nānādiṭṭhivādesu vā nānākammāyatanasippāyatana vijjāṭhānesu
anya-e0501n0:80_8: vā yathāpaṭṭhapitesu gāmanigamanagarakhettavatthu taḷākapokkharaṇiāvāṭādīsu vā geharathasakaṭanāvā
anya-e0501n0:80_9: sampotasambandhādīsu vā jātarūparajatamaṇimuttādīsu vā dāyajjaṃ paṭipajjantā loke vaḍḍhanti.
anya-e0501n0:81_0: Anāgatopi metteyyo nāma buddho ca tassa dhammo ca tassa saṅgho ca etarahi bahujjanānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:81_1: pāramipuññappavattiyā pakatūpanissayapaccayo. Tathā imasmiṃ bhave ca pacchime kāle
anya-e0501n0:81_2: paṭilabhissamānā issariyaṭṭhānadhanadhaññasampattiyo purime kāle ṭhitānaṃ mahājanānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:81_3: nānābhisaṅkhāruppattiyā pakatūpanissaya paccayo. Anāgatabhave ca anubhavissamānā
anya-e0501n0:81_4: bhavasampatti bhoga sampattiyo maggaphalanibbānasampattiyo ca etarahi paccuppannabhave
anya-e0501n0:81_5: ṭhitānaṃ dānasīlādipuññakiriyuppattiyā pakatūpanissayapaccayo. Yathā hi loke hemante
anya-e0501n0:81_6: kāle dhaññapphalāni labhissāmāti vassike kāle kassanavappanakammāni ārabhanti, kamme
anya-e0501n0:81_7: siddhe taṃ taṃ dhanaṃ labhissāmāti pubbabhāge taṃ taṃ vīriyakammaṃ vā taṃ taṃ paññākammaṃ
anya-e0501n0:81_8: vā ārabhanti. Tattha dhaññapphalappaṭilābho ca taṃ taṃ dhanappaṭi lābhoca taṃ taṃ
anya-e0501n0:81_9: kammārambhassa anāgatapakatūpanissayapaccayo taṃ taṃ kammārambho ca dhaññapphalappaṭilābhassa
anya-e0501n0:81_10: ca taṃ taṃ dhanappaṭi lābhassa ca atītapakatūpanissayapaccayo. Evameva pacchime anāgate
anya-e0501n0:81_11: kāle nānākammapphalāni sampassantā patthayantā mahājanā purime paccuppanne kāle nānāpuññakammāni
anya-e0501n0:81_12: ārabhanti. Tattha puññapphalāni puññakammānaṃ anāgatapakatūpanissayapaccayo. Puññakammāni
anya-e0501n0:82: Paccuppannā buddhāyo paccayā paccuppannānaṃ manussadevabrahmānaṃ paccuppannā mātāpitaro paccuppannānaṃ puttadhītādīnaṃ paccuppannapakatūpa nissayo nāma. So supākaṭoyeva.
anya-e0501n0:83_0: Ajjhattabhūtā pakatūpanissayadhammā nāma buddhādīsu saviññāṇakasantānesu uppannā
anya-e0501n0:83_1: paccayadhammā. Bahiddhābhūtā pakatūpanissayadhammā nāma sattānaṃ patiṭṭhānabhūtā
anya-e0501n0:83_2: pathavipabbatanadī samuddādayo tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ bahūpakārā araññavanarukkha tiṇapubbaṇṇāparaṇṇādayo
anya-e0501n0:83_3: candasūriyagahanakkhattādayo vassodakaaggivātasītauṇhādayo ca sabbepi te sattānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:83_4: kusaluppattiyā vā akusaluppattiyā vā sukhuppattiyā vā dukkhuppattiyā vā balavapaccayā honti.
anya-e0501n0:84_0: Ime janā diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyissāmāti bodhipakkhiya dhamme vā bhāventi, anāgate
anya-e0501n0:84_1: buddhakāle parinibbāyissāmāti pāramīdhamme vā paripūrenti. Tattha nibbānaṃ tesaṃ
anya-e0501n0:85: Loke nānāvohārabhūtā nāmapaññattiyo ca buddha sāsane tipiṭakapariyattidhammabhūtā nāmapaññattiyo ca tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ jānanatthāya balavapaccayo.
anya-e0501n0:86_0: Tattha saṅkhatadhammā nāma paccaye sati uppajjanti, asati nuppajjanti. Uppajjitvāpi
anya-e0501n0:86_1: paccaye sati tiṭṭhanti, asati na tiṭṭhanti. Tasmā tesaṃ uppattiyā vā ṭhitiyā vā paccayo
anya-e0501n0:86_2: nāma icchitabbo. Nibbānaṃ pana paññatti ca asaṅkhatadhammā honti ajātidhammā anuppādadhammā
anya-e0501n0:86_3: nicca dhammā dhuvadhammā. Tasmā tesaṃ uppādāya vā ṭhitiyā vā paccayo nāma natthīti.
anya-e0501n0:87_0: Kusalo kusalassa upanissayo. Saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyatītiādinā
anya-e0501n0:87_1: supākaṭo. Tathā rāgaṃ upanissāya pāṇaṃ hanati, adinnaṃ ādiyatītiādinā sappāyaṃ utuṃ
anya-e0501n0:87_2: sappāyaṃ bhojanaṃ upanissāya kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ paccanubhotītiādinā ca akusalo akusalassa,
anya-e0501n0:88_0: Kusalo pana akusalassapi balavūpanissayo. Dānaṃ datvā tena dānena attānaṃ ukkaṃseti,
anya-e0501n0:88_1: paraṃ vambheti. Tathā sīla sampanno hutvā samādhisampanno hutvā paññāsampanno hutvā
anya-e0501n0:89_0: Kusalo abyākatassapi balavūpanissayo. Sabbāni catubhūmikakusalakammāni vā kammaparivārāni
anya-e0501n0:89_1: kusalāni vā kālantare catubhūmikānaṃ vipākābyākatānaṃ balavūpanissayo. Dānapāramiṃ
anya-e0501n0:89_2: pūrentā pūraṇakāle bahuṃ kāyikadukkhaṃ paccanubhavanti. Tathā sīlapāramiṃ nikkhamapāramiṃ
anya-e0501n0:89_3: paññāpāramiṃ vīriyapāramiṃ khantipāramiṃ saccapāramiṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ mettāpāramiṃ
anya-e0501n0:89_4: upekkhā pāramiṃ. Eseva nayo jhānabhāvanā maggabhāvanāsupi.
anya-e0501n0:90_0: Akusalo kusalassapi balavūpanissayo. Idhekacco pāpaṃ katvā pacchā vippaṭisārī hutvā
anya-e0501n0:90_1: tassa pāpassa pahānāya dānasīlajhānamaggakusalāni sampādeti. Taṃ pāpaṃ tesaṃ kusalānaṃ balavūpanissayo.
anya-e0501n0:91_0: Akusalo abyākatassapi balavūpanissayo. Idha bahū janā duccaritāni katvā catūsu apāyesu
anya-e0501n0:91_1: patitvā apāyadukkhaṃ paccanubhavanti. Diṭṭhadhammepi keci attano vā parassa vā duccaritakamma
anya-e0501n0:91_2: paccayā bahuṃ dukkhaṃ paccanubhavanti. Keci duccaritakammena dhanaṃ labhitvā sukhaṃ
anya-e0501n0:91_3: paccanubhavanti. Bahujjanā rāgamūlakaṃ bahuṃ dukkhaṃ paccanubhavanti, dosamūlakaṃ
anya-e0501n0:92_0: Abyākato kusalassapi balavūpanissayo. Dhana sampattiyā dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ pūreti,
anya-e0501n0:92_1: paññaṃ pūreti, bhāvanāsappāyaṃ āvāsaṃ vā leṇaṃ vā guhaṃvā rukkhaṃ vā araññaṃ vā pabbataṃ
anya-e0501n0:92_2: vā gocaragāmaṃ vā utusappāyaṃ vā āhārasappāyaṃ vā labhitvā taṃ taṃ bhāvanaṃ bhāveti.
anya-e0501n0:93_0: Abyākato akusalassapi balavūpanissayo. Loke cakkhusampadaṃ nissāya bahūni dassanamūlāni
anya-e0501n0:93_1: akusalāni uppajjanti. Esa nayo sotasampadādīsu. Tathā hatthasampadaṃ pādasampadaṃ
anya-e0501n0:93_2: satthasampadaṃ āvudhasampadantiādināpi vattabbo. Evaṃ upanissayo tividho hoti.
anya-e0501n0:94_0: Idha suttantūpanissayopi vattabbo. Kalyāṇamittaṃ upa nissāya pāpamittaṃ upanissāya
anya-e0501n0:94_1: gāmaṃ upanissāya araññaṃ upanissāyātiādinā bahūsu ṭhānesu āgato. Api ca pañcaniyāmadhammā
anya-e0501n0:94_2: sattaloka saṅkhāraloka okāsaloka saṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ lokānaṃ avicchinnappavattiyā
anya-e0501n0:94_3: balavapaccayā honti. Ayañca attho niyāmadīpaniyaṃ amhehi vitthārato dīpitoti.
anya-e0501n0:95: Kenaṭṭhena ārammaṇūpanissayoti. Adhipatibhūtaṃ ārammaṇameva ārammaṇikadhammānaṃ balavanissayaṭṭhena ārammaṇūpa nissayo.
anya-e0501n0:96_0: Kenaṭṭhena anantarūpanissayoti. Purimaṃ anantaracittameva pacchimassa anantaracittassa
anya-e0501n0:96_1: uppajjanatthāya balavanissayaṭṭhena anantarūpanissayo. Mātā viya purimacittaṃ, putto
anya-e0501n0:96_2: viya pacchimacittaṃ. Yathā mātā attano anantare puttassa uppajjanatthāya balavūpa
anya-e0501n0:96_3: nissayo hoti, tathā purimacittaṃ pacchimacittassa uppajjanatthāyāti.
anya-e0501n0:97: Kenaṭṭhena pakatūpanissayoti. Pakatiyāva loke paṇḍitānaṃ pākaṭo upanissayo pakatūpanissayo.
anya-e0501n0:98_0: Ettha ca anantarūpanissayānubhāvo anantaracitte eva pharati. Pakatūpanissayānubhāvo
anya-e0501n0:98_1: pana dūrepi pharatiyeva. Tathā hi imasmiṃ bhave purimesu divasesu vā māsesu vā saṃvaccharesu
anya-e0501n0:98_2: vā diṭṭhasutaghāyitasāyitaphusitaviññātāni ārammaṇāni pacchātathārūpe paccaye sati
anya-e0501n0:98_3: vassasatepi manodvāre āpātaṃ āgacchanti. Idaṃ nāma pubbe mayā diṭṭhaṃ sutantiādinā
anya-e0501n0:98_4: sattā anussaranti. Opapātikasattā pana purimabhavaṃpi anussaranti. Tathā manussesupi
anya-e0501n0:98_5: appekacce jātissarasaññālābhino. Tathā pubbe anekasatasahassesu diṭṭhādīsu vatthūsu
anya-e0501n0:98_6: pacchā ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekaṃ vatthuṃ disvā vā sutvā vā tasmiṃ eva khaṇe bahūsupi tesu
anya-e0501n0:98_7: manoviññāṇasantānaṃ pharamānaṃ pavattatīti. Upanissayapaccaya dīpanā niṭṭhitā.
anya-e0501n0:100: Tividho purejātapaccayo. Vatthupurejātapaccayo ca ārammaṇapurejātapaccayo ca vatthārammaṇapurejātapaccayo ca.
anya-e0501n0:101: Tattha vatthupurejāto ca vatthārammaṇapurejāto ca pubbe nissayapaccaye nissayanāmena vuttā eva.
anya-e0501n0:102_0: Ārammaṇapurejāto nāma paccuppannāni aṭṭhārasanipphannarūpāni eva. Tesupi paccuppannāni
anya-e0501n0:102_1: rūpasaddādīni pañcārammaṇāni pañcannaṃ pañcaviññāṇa vīthicittānaṃ niyamato ārammaṇapurejātapaccayā
anya-e0501n0:102_2: honti. Yathā hi vīṇāsaddā nāma vīṇātantīsu vīṇādaṇḍakena paharaṇa paccayā eva uppajjanti.
anya-e0501n0:102_3: Evañca sati te saddā purejātāhi vīṇātanti vīṇādaṇḍakehi vinā uppajjituṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e0501n0:102_4: Evamevaṃ pañca viññāṇa vīthicittānipi pañcasu vatthudvāresu pañcannaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:102_5: āpātāgamana paccayā eva uppajjanti. Āpātāgamanañca tesaṃ dvinnaṃ ṭhitipattakāle eva
anya-e0501n0:102_6: hoti. Na kevalañca tasmiṃ kāle tāni pañcārammaṇāni tesu pañcavatthūsu eva āpātamāgacchanti.
anya-e0501n0:102_7: Atha kho bhavaṅgamanodvārepi āpātaṃ āgacchantiyeva. Tasmiṃ āpātagamanattā eva taṃ
anya-e0501n0:102_8: bhavaṅgampi dvikkhattuṃ calitvā upacchijjati, bhavaṅgupacchede eva tāni vīthicittāni
anya-e0501n0:102_9: uppajjanti. Evañca sati tāni vīthicittāni purejātehi vatthu dvārārammaṇehi vinā uppajjituṃ
anya-e0501n0:102_10: na sakkontīti. Tāni pana sabbānipi aṭṭhārasanipphannarūpāni niruddhāni hutvā atītānipi
anya-e0501n0:102_11: honti, anuppannāni hutvā anāgatānipi honti. Uppannāni hutvā paccuppannānipi honti.
anya-e0501n0:102_12: Sabbānipi manoviññāṇavīthicittānaṃ ārammaṇāni honti. Tesu paccuppannāni eva tesaṃ
anya-e0501n0:102_13: ārammaṇapurejātapaccayā honti. Yadā dūre vā paṭicchanne vā ṭhitaṃ taṃ taṃ ārammaṇavatthuṃ
anya-e0501n0:102_14: manasā eva ārammaṇaṃ karoti, tadā taṃ taṃ vatthu sace tattha tattha vijjamānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0501n0:104_0: Pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ paccuppannaṃ cittaṃ purejātassa paccuppannassa catu samuṭṭhānikassa
anya-e0501n0:104_1: rūpakāyassa vuḍḍhiviruḷhiyā pacchājātapaccayo. Yathā taṃ pacchimavassesu anuvassaṃ
anya-e0501n0:104_2: vassamānāni vassodakāni purimavassesu jātānaṃ rukkhapotakānaṃ vuḍḍhiviruḷhiyā pacchājāta paccayā hontīti.
anya-e0501n0:105_0: Tattha pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ cittanti paṭhamabhavaṅgato paṭṭhāya yāva cuti cittā sabbaṃ
anya-e0501n0:105_1: cittaṃ vuccati. Purejātassāti paṭisandhicittena sahuppannaṃ kammajarūpakāyaṃ ādiṃ
anya-e0501n0:106_0: Paṭisandhicittena sahuppannassa kammajarūpakāyassa paṭhama bhavaṅgādīni pannarasabhavaṅgacittāni
anya-e0501n0:106_1: pacchājātapaccayā honti. Paṭisandhi cittaṃ pana tena kāyena sahuppannattā pacchajātaṃ
anya-e0501n0:106_2: na hoti. Soḷasamabhavaṅgacittañca tassa kāyassa bhijjanakkhette uppannattā paccayo
anya-e0501n0:107_0: Paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe pana dve rūpakāyā uppajjanti kammajarūpakāyo ca utujarūpakāyoca.
anya-e0501n0:107_1: Tathā bhaṅgakkhaṇepi. Paṭhamabhavaṅgassa uppādakkhaṇe pana tayo rūpakāyā uppajjanti
anya-e0501n0:107_2: kammajarūpakāyo ca utujarūpakāyo ca cittajarūpakāyo ca. Yadā bahiddhāhārappharaṇaṃ
anya-e0501n0:107_3: labhitvā ajjhattāhāro āhārajarūpakāyaṃ janeti, tato paṭṭhāya catusamuṭṭhānikā cattāro
anya-e0501n0:107_4: rūpakāyā dīpa jālā viya pavattanti. Te uppādakkhaṇaṃ atikkamma yāva ṭhitibhāvena
anya-e0501n0:107_5: dharanti, tāva pannarasacittāni tesaṃ kāyānaṃ pacchājātapaccayā hontiyeva.
anya-e0501n0:108_0: Vuḍḍhiviruḷhiyāti catusamuṭṭhānikarūpasantatiyā uparūpari vuḍḍhiyā ca viruḷhiyā ca.
anya-e0501n0:108_1: Tathāhi purimā purimā cattāro rūpakāyā sace pacchājāta paccayaṃ punappunaṃ labhanti,
anya-e0501n0:108_2: evaṃ sati te nirujjhantāpi pacchārūpasantatiparamparānaṃ vuḍḍhiyā ca viruḷhiyā ca
anya-e0501n0:108_3: vepullāya ca balava paccayā hutvā nirujjhantīti. Pacchājātapaccayadīpanā niṭṭhitā.
anya-e0501n0:110_0: Dvādasa akusalacittāni sattarasa lokiyakusala cittāni āvajjanadvayavajjitāni aṭṭhārasakiriyacittānīti
anya-e0501n0:110_1: satta cattālīsaṃ lokiyajavanacittāni āsevanapaccayo. Tesu nirantarappavattaṃ javanasantatiṃ
anya-e0501n0:110_2: patvā purimaṃ purimaṃ javanacittaṃ āsevana paccayo. Catūhi maggacittehi pacchimaṃ
anya-e0501n0:112_0: Tattha paguṇabhāvoti punappunaṃ sajjhāyitassa pāḷipāṭhassa sukhena pavattanaṃ viya
anya-e0501n0:112_2: pavattanaṃ. Parivāso nāma koseyyavatthaṃ punappunaṃ sugandhena parivāsanaṃ viya cittasantāne
anya-e0501n0:112_3: punappunnaṃ rajjanadussanādinā vā arajjana adussanādinā vā parivāsanaṃ. Purimasmiṃ
anya-e0501n0:112_4: javanacitte niruddhepi tassa javanavego na nirujjhati, pacchimaṃ cittasantānaṃ pharamāno
anya-e0501n0:112_5: pavattatiyeva. Tasmā pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ javanacittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ tena vegena paggahitaṃ
anya-e0501n0:112_6: balavataraṃ hutvā uppajjati. Evaṃ purimacittaṃ attano parivāsaṃ pacchimacittaṃ gaṇhāpeti.
anya-e0501n0:112_7: Pacchimañca cittaṃ purimassa cittassa parivāsaṃ gahetvā pavattati. Evaṃ santepi so
anya-e0501n0:112_8: āsevanavego pakatiyā sattahi cittavārehi parikkhayaṃ gacchati, tato paraṃ tadārammaṇavipāka
anya-e0501n0:112_9: cittaṃ vā uppajjati, bhavaṅga cittavāro vā pavattati.
anya-e0501n0:113_0: Idha suttantāsevanapaccayopi vattabbo. Satipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāveti, sammappadhānaṃ bhāveti,
anya-e0501n0:113_1: satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti, dhamma vicayasambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti, sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti,
anya-e0501n0:113_2: sammāsaṅkappaṃ bhāvetītiādinā bahūsu ṭhānesu vutto. Tattha bhāvetīti ekaṃpi divasaṃ
anya-e0501n0:113_3: bhāveti, sattapi divasāni bhāveti, ekaṃpi māsaṃ bhāveti, sattapi māsāni bhāveti,
anya-e0501n0:113_4: ekaṃpi saṃvaccharaṃ bhāveti, sattapi saṃvaccharāni bhāvetīti attho.
anya-e0501n0:114: Purimapurimesu bhavesu āsevitāni bhāvitāni bahulī katāni kusalāni vā akusalāni vā pacchimapacchimesu bhavesu balavatarānaṃ kusalānaṃ vā akusalānaṃ vā uppattiyā āsevana paccayo.
anya-e0501n0:115: Kālantare vā bhavantare vā tādisānaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ uppattiyā paccayo upanissayapaccayo nāma. Tesaṃyeva balavataratthāya paccayo āsevanapaccayo nāma.
anya-e0501n0:116_0: Lokepi mahantesu cittabhāvanākammesu vācā bhāvanākammesu kāyabhāvanākammesu aṅgapaccaṅgabhāvanākammesu
anya-e0501n0:116_1: kammāyatanasippāyatanavijjāṭhānesu ca āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkammānaṃ nissandaguṇā
anya-e0501n0:117_0: Sabbesaṃ khaṇikadhammānaṃ majjhe evarūpassa āsevana paccayassa vijjamānattā purisabalapurisathāmānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:117_1: uparūpari vaḍḍhana vasena cirakālaṃ pavattitāni purisakammāni nipphattiṃ pāpuṇanti,
anya-e0501n0:120_0: Tattha khaṇattayasamaṅgi bhūtā sabbāpi kusalākusalā byākatacetanā sahajātakamma paccayo.
anya-e0501n0:120_1: Cetanāsampayuttā sabbepi cittacetasikā dhammāca paṭisandhicittena sahuppannā kammajarūpadhammā
anya-e0501n0:120_2: ca pavattikāle sabbepi cittajarūpadhammā ca tassa paccayassa paccayuppannā.
anya-e0501n0:121: Atītā kusalākusalacetanā nānākkhaṇikakamma paccayo. Bāttiṃsavidhā lokiyavipāka cittacetasikā dhammā ca sabbe kammajarūpadhammā ca tassa paccayassa paccayuppannā.
anya-e0501n0:122_0: Kenaṭṭhena kammanti. Kiriyāvisesaṭṭhena kammaṃ. Cetanā hi kiriyā viseso hoti sabbakammesu
anya-e0501n0:122_1: jeṭṭhakattā. Tā hi sabbesu kāyavacīmanokammesu paccupaṭṭhitesu tassa tassa kammassa
anya-e0501n0:122_2: nipphattatthāya sampayuttadhamme ceteti kappeti saṃvidahati, ekato uṭṭhāpeti, tasmā
anya-e0501n0:122_3: sabbakammesu jeṭṭhakā hoti. Iti kiriyāvisesaṭṭhena kammaṃ nāma. Karonti etenāti vā
anya-e0501n0:122_4: kammaṃ. Kiṃ karonti. Kāyikakiriyaṃpi karonti, vācasikakiriyaṃpi karonti, mānasikakiriyaṃpi
anya-e0501n0:122_5: karonti. Tattha kāyikakiriyā nāma gamanaṭhāna nisajjādayo abhikkamanapaṭikkamanādayo
anya-e0501n0:122_6: antamaso akkhidalānaṃ ukkhipananikkhipanānipi. Vācasikakiriyā nāma vācāpavattanakiriyā.
anya-e0501n0:122_7: Mānasikakiriyā nāma sucintita ducintitakiriyā, antamaso pañca viññāṇānaṃ dassanakiccasavanakiccādīnipi.
anya-e0501n0:122_8: Sabbāpi imā kiriyāyo etāya cetanāya sattā karonti, saṃvidahanti, tasmā sā cetanā kammaṃ nāma.
anya-e0501n0:123_0: Attano paccayuppannena saha jāyatīti sahajātaṃ. Sahajātañca taṃ kammañcāti sahajātakammaṃ.
anya-e0501n0:123_1: Sahajātakammaṃ hutvā paccayo sahajātakamma paccayo. Sahajātakammabhāvena paccayoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0501n0:124_0: Añño kammassa uppattikkhaṇo añño vipākassa uppattikkhaṇoti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ uppattikkhaṇo
anya-e0501n0:124_1: etassāti nānākkhaṇikaṃ. Nānākkhaṇikañca taṃ kammañcāti nānākkhaṇikakammaṃ. Nānākkhaṇikakammaṃ
anya-e0501n0:124_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Ariyamaggasampayuttā cetanā attano niruddhānantare eva ariyaphalavipākaṃ
anya-e0501n0:125_0: Ettha ca ekā dānakusalacetanā attanā sahajātānaṃ cittacetasikānañca kāyikavācasikakiriyābhūtānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:125_1: cittajarūpānañca sahajātakammapaccayo. Tāya cetanāya āyatiṃ kālantare uppajjamānassa
anya-e0501n0:125_2: vipākakkhandhassa ca kammajarūpakkhandhassa ca nānākkhaṇika kammapaccayo. Evaṃ ekā
anya-e0501n0:125_3: kammapathapattā sucaritaduccaritacetanā dvīsu kālesudvinnaṃ paccayuppannānaṃ dvīhi
anya-e0501n0:126_0: Ettha ca nānākkhaṇikakammapaccaye kammanti kiriyāviseso. So pana cetanāya niruddhāyapi
anya-e0501n0:126_1: anirujjhitvā taṃ cittasantānaṃ anugacchatiyeva. Yadā vipaccituṃ okāsaṃ labhati, tadā
anya-e0501n0:126_2: so kiriyā viseso cutinantare eko attabhāvo hutvā vipaccati pātubhavati. Okāsaṃ pana
anya-e0501n0:126_3: alabhamānā bhavasataṃpi bhavasahassaṃpi bhavasatasahassaṃpi taṃ santānaṃ anugacchatiyeva.
anya-e0501n0:126_4: Mahaggatakammaṃ pana laddhokāse sati dutiyabhave brahmaloke eko brahmattabhāvo hutvā
anya-e0501n0:126_5: vipaccati pātubhavati. Suparipakkakammattā pana dutiyabhaveyeva khīyati, tato paraṃ
anya-e0501n0:128_0: Chattiṃsavidhā vipākabhūtā sahajātacittacetasikā dhammā vipāka paccayo. Teyeva aññamaññañca
anya-e0501n0:128_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe kammajarūpāni ca pavattikkhaṇe vipāka cittajātāni cittajarūpāni
anya-e0501n0:129_0: Kenaṭṭhena vipākoti. Vipaccanaṭṭhena vipāko. Vipaccanaṃ nāma mudutaruṇabhāvaṃ atikkamma
anya-e0501n0:129_1: vipakkabhāvaṃ āpajjanaṃ. Kassa pana dhammassa mudutaruṇabhāvo, kassa vipakkabhāvoti.
anya-e0501n0:129_2: Nānākkhaṇikakammapaccaya saṅkhātassa atītakammassa mudutaruṇabhāvo, tasseva kammassa vipakkabhāvo.
anya-e0501n0:130: Tattha ekassa kammassa catasso avatthāyo honti cetanā vatthā kammāvatthā nimittāvatthā vipākāvatthāti.
anya-e0501n0:131: Tattha tāya cetanāya niruddhāyapi tassā kiriyā viseso na nirujjhati, taṃ cittasantānaṃ anugacchatiyeva. Ayaṃ kammāvatthā nāma.
anya-e0501n0:132_0: Nimittāvatthāti taṃ kammaṃ yadā vipaccituṃ okāsaṃ labhati, tadā maraṇāsannakāle tassa
anya-e0501n0:132_1: puggalassa tameva kammaṃ vā paccupaṭṭhāti, so puggalo tadā dānaṃ dento viya sīlaṃ
anya-e0501n0:132_2: rakkhanto viya pāṇaghātaṃ vā karonto viya hoti. Kammanimittaṃ vā paccupaṭṭhāti, dāna
anya-e0501n0:132_3: vatthuādikaṃ vā satthādikaṃ vā aññaṃ vāpi pubbe tassa kammassa upakaraṇabhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0501n0:132_4: tadā tassa puggalassa hatthagataṃ viya hoti. Gatinimittaṃ vā paccupaṭṭhāti, dibbavimānādikaṃ
anya-e0501n0:132_5: vā nirayaggijālādikaṃ vā uppajjamānabhave upalabhitabbaṃ vā anubhavitabbaṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0501n0:132_6: tadā dissamānaṃ hoti. Ayaṃ nimittā vatthā nāma.
anya-e0501n0:133_0: Vipākāvatthāti sace so puggalo tathā paccupaṭṭhitaṃ taṃ kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā
anya-e0501n0:133_1: gatinimittaṃ vā ekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ amuñcamāno marati, tadā taṃ kammaṃ tasmiṃbhave vipaccati,
anya-e0501n0:133_2: taṃ kammaṃ tasmiṃbhave eko attabhāvo hutvā pātubhavati. Tattha purimāsu tīsu avatthāsu
anya-e0501n0:133_3: taṃ kammaṃ mudutaruṇabhūtaṃ hoti, pacchimaṃ pana vipākāvatthaṃ patvā vipakkabhūtaṃ
anya-e0501n0:133_4: hoti. Tena vuttaṃ vipaccanaṃ nāma mudutaruṇabhāvaṃ atikkamma vipakkabhāvaṃ āpajjananti.
anya-e0501n0:133_5: Evaṃ vipakkabhāvaṃ āpanno citta cetasikadhammasamūho vipāko nāma.
anya-e0501n0:134_0: Tattha yathā ambapphalāni nāma yadā vipakkabhāvaṃ āpajjanti, tadā sabbaso siniddharūpāni
anya-e0501n0:134_1: honti. Evamevaṃ vipākadhammā nāma nirussāhā nibyāpārā hutvā sabbaso santarūpā honti.
anya-e0501n0:134_2: Tesaṃ santarūpattāyeva bhavaṅgacittānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgato vuṭṭhānakāle
anya-e0501n0:134_3: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ na jānāti. Tathāhi rattiyaṃ niddāyantassa purimabhave maraṇāsannakāle
anya-e0501n0:134_4: yathāgahitaṃ kammādikaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha bhavaṅgasotaṃ pavattamānaṃpi tassa bhavaṅgasotassa
anya-e0501n0:134_5: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha idaṃ nāma me purimabhave ārammaṇaṃ diṭṭhanti kassaci jānanavīthicittassa
anya-e0501n0:134_6: uppattiyā paccayo na hoti. So puggalo niddāyanakālepi uṭṭhānakālepi purimabhavasiddhaṃ
anya-e0501n0:134_7: taṃ nimittaṃ na jānāti. Evaṃ nirussāhanibyāpārasantarūpa bhāvena upakārakatā vipākapaccayatā
anya-e0501n0:137_0: Tattha rūpāhārapaccayo nāma kabaḷīkārāhārasaṅkhātaṃ oja rūpaṃ vuccati. So ca ajjhattāhāro
anya-e0501n0:137_1: bahiddhāhāroti duvidho. Kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ sattānaṃ sabbepi catusamuṭṭhānikarūpadhammā
anya-e0501n0:138_0: Arūpāhāro pana tividho phassāhāro manosañcetanā hāro viññāṇāhāro ca. Tayopete dhammā
anya-e0501n0:138_1: sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpadhammānaṃ āhārapaccayo honti. Sahajātā ca nāmarūpa dhammā tesaṃ paccayuppannā.
anya-e0501n0:139_0: Kenaṭṭhena āhāroti. Bhusaṃ haraṇaṭṭhena āhāro. Bhusaṃ haraṇaṭṭhenātica daḷhaṃ pavattāpanaṭṭhena,
anya-e0501n0:139_1: cirakālaṃ ṭhitiyā vuḍḍhiyā viruḷhiyā vepullāya upatthambhanaṭṭhenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0501n0:140_0: Tattha duvidho rūpāhāro ajjhattasantāne catusamuṭṭhānikaṃ rūpakāyaṃ upabrūhayanto
anya-e0501n0:140_1: bhusaṃ harati, daḷhaṃ pavatteti, ciraṃ addhānaṃ gameti, taṃ taṃ āyukappapariyosānaṃ pāpetīti āhāro.
anya-e0501n0:141_0: Phassāhāro ārammaṇesu iṭṭhāniṭṭharasaṃ nīharanto sampayuttadhamme bhusaṃ harati.
anya-e0501n0:141_1: Manosañcetanāhāro kāyavacī manokammesu ussāhaṃ janento sampayuttadhamme bhusaṃ harati.
anya-e0501n0:141_2: Viññāṇāhāro ārammaṇavijānanaṭṭhena pubbaṅgamakiccaṃ vahanto sampayuttadhamme bhusaṃ
anya-e0501n0:141_3: harati, daḷhaṃ pavatteti, ciraṃ addhānaṃ gametīti āhāro. Sampayuttadhamme bhusaṃ
anya-e0501n0:142_0: Idha suttantanayopi vattabbo. Yathā sakuṇā nāma cakkhūhi disāvidisaṃ vibhāvetvā pattehi
anya-e0501n0:142_1: rukkhato rukkhaṃ vanato vanaṃ ākāsena pakkhanditvā tuṇḍakehi phalāphalāni tuditvā
anya-e0501n0:142_2: yāvajīvaṃ attānaṃ yāpenti. Tathā ime sattā chahi viññāṇehi ārammaṇāni vibhāvetvā
anya-e0501n0:142_3: chahi manosañcetanāhārehi ārammaṇavatthuppaṭilābhatthāya ussukkanaṃ katvā chahi phassāhārehi
anya-e0501n0:142_4: ārammaṇesu rasaṃ pātubhavantaṃ katvā sukhadukkhaṃ anubhavanti. Viññāṇehi vā ārammaṇāni
anya-e0501n0:142_5: vibhāvetvā nāmarūpa sampattiṃ sādhenti. Phassehi ārammaṇesu rasaṃ pātubhavantaṃ katvā
anya-e0501n0:142_6: ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ vedanaṃ sampādetvā taṇhāvepullaṃ āpajjanti. Cetanāhi taṇhāmūlakāni
anya-e0501n0:142_7: nānākammāni pasavetvā bhavato bhavaṃ saṃsaranti. Evaṃ āhāradhammānaṃ mahantaṃ āhārakiccaṃ
anya-e0501n0:144: Tividho indriyapaccayo sahajātindriyapaccayo pure jātindriyapaccayo rūpajīvitindriyapaccayo.
anya-e0501n0:145_0: Tattha pannarasindriyadhammā sahajātindriyapaccayo nāma, jīvitindriyaṃ manindriyaṃ
anya-e0501n0:145_1: sukhindriyaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ domanassindriyaṃ upekkhindriyaṃ saddhindriyaṃ
anya-e0501n0:145_2: vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ aññindriyaṃ
anya-e0501n0:145_3: aññātāvindriyanti. Tehi sahajātā cittacetasikadhammā ca rūpadhammā ca tassa paccayuppannā.
anya-e0501n0:146: Pañcindriyarūpāni purejātindriyapaccayo, cakkhundriyaṃ sotindriyaṃ ghānindriyaṃ jivhindriyaṃ kāyindriyaṃ. Pañcaviññāṇacitta cetasika dhammā tassa paccayuppannā.
anya-e0501n0:147: Ekaṃ rūpajīvitindriyaṃ rūpajīvitindriyapaccayo. Sabbāni kammaja rūpāni jīvitarūpavajjitāni tassa paccayuppannāni.
anya-e0501n0:148_0: Kenaṭṭhena indriyanti. Issariyaṭṭhena indriyaṃ. Tattha kattha issariyanti. Attano
anya-e0501n0:148_1: attano paccayuppannesu dhammesu issariyaṃ. Kasmiṃ kasmiṃ kicce issariyanti. Attano
anya-e0501n0:148_2: attano kicce issariyaṃ. Nāmajīvitaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ jīvanakicce issariyaṃ. Jīvanakicceti
anya-e0501n0:148_3: āyuvaḍḍhanakicce, santatiṭhitiyā cirakālaṭhitikicceti attho. Manindriyaṃ ārammaṇaggahaṇakicce
anya-e0501n0:148_4: sampayuttadhammānaṃ issariyaṃ. Avaseso indriyaṭṭho pubbe indriyayamakadīpaniyaṃ vuttoyeva.
anya-e0501n0:149_0: Ettha vadeyya, dve itthindriyapurisindriyadhammā indriyabhūtā samānāpi kasmā indriyapaccaye
anya-e0501n0:149_1: visuṃ na gahitāti. Paccayakiccassa abhāvato. Tividhañhi paccayakiccaṃ jananakiccañca
anya-e0501n0:149_2: upatthambhanakiccañca anupālanakiccañca. Tattha yo paccayo paccayuppannadhammassa
anya-e0501n0:149_3: uppādāya paccayo hoti, yasmiṃ asati paccayuppanno dhammo na uppajjati, tassa paccayakiccaṃ
anya-e0501n0:149_4: jananakiccaṃ nāma. Yathā anantarapaccayo. Yo paccayo paccayuppannadhammassa ṭhitiyā
anya-e0501n0:149_5: ca vuḍḍhiyā ca viruḷhiyā ca paccayo hoti, yasmiṃ asati paccayuppanno dhammo na tiṭṭhati
anya-e0501n0:149_6: na vaḍḍhati na virūhati, tassa paccayakiccaṃ upatthambhanakiccaṃ nāma. Yathā pacchājātapaccayo.
anya-e0501n0:149_7: Yo paccayo paccayuppannassa dhammassa pavattiyā paccayo hoti, yena vinā paccayuppanno
anya-e0501n0:149_8: dhammo cirakālaṃ na pavattati, santati gamanaṃ chijjati, tassa paccaya kiccaṃ anupālanakiccaṃ
anya-e0501n0:149_9: nāma. Yathā rūpa jīvitindriyapaccayo. Ete pana dve indriyadhammā tesu tīsu paccaya
anya-e0501n0:149_10: kiccesu ekakiccaṃpi nasādhenti, tasmā ete dve dhammā indriya paccaye visuṃ na gahitāti.
anya-e0501n0:150_0: Etaṃ sante ete dve dhammā indriyātipi na vattabbāti. No na vattabbā. Kasmā. Indriyakiccasabbhāvatoti.
anya-e0501n0:150_1: Kiṃ pana etesaṃ indriyakiccanti. Liṅganimittakuttaākappesu issaratā indriya kiccaṃ.
anya-e0501n0:150_2: Tathā hi yassa puggalassa paṭisandhikkhaṇe itthindriyarūpaṃ uppajjati, tassa santāne
anya-e0501n0:150_3: catūhi kammādīhi paccayehi uppannā pañcakkhandha dhammā itthibhāvāya pariṇamanti,
anya-e0501n0:150_4: so attabhāvo ekantena itthiliṅga itthinimitta itthikutta itthākappayutto hoti, no
anya-e0501n0:150_5: aññathā. Na ca itthindriyarūpaṃ te pañcakkhandhadhamme janeti, na ca upatthambhati,
anya-e0501n0:150_6: nāpi anupāleti, atha kho te dhammā attano attano paccayehi uppajjamānā evañcevañca
anya-e0501n0:150_7: uppajjantūti āṇaṃ ṭhapentaṃ viya tesu attano anubhāvaṃ pavatteti. Te ca dhammā tatheva
anya-e0501n0:150_8: uppajjanti, no aññathāti. Ayaṃ itthindriyarūpassa itthiliṅgādīsu issaratā. Esa nayo
anya-e0501n0:150_9: purisindriyarūpassa purisaliṅgādīsu issaratāyaṃ. Evaṃ ete dve dhammā liṅgādīsu indriyakicca
anya-e0501n0:151_0: Hadayavatthurūpaṃ pana dvinnaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayavatthukiccaṃ sādhayamānaṃpi
anya-e0501n0:151_1: tāsu indriyakiccaṃ na sādheti. Na hi bhāvita cittassa puggalassa hadayarūpe pasannevā
anya-e0501n0:151_2: appasanne vā jātepi manoviññāṇadhātuyo tadanuvattikā hontīti. Indriya paccayadīpanā niṭṭhitā.
anya-e0501n0:153_0: Satta jhānaṅgāni jhānapaccayo, vitakko vicāro pīti somanassaṃ domanassaṃ upekkhā
anya-e0501n0:153_1: ekaggatā. Tehi sahajātā pañcaviññāṇavajjitā cittacetasikadhammā ca rūpadhammā ca
anya-e0501n0:154_0: Kenaṭṭhena jhānanti. Upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena jhānaṃ. Upanijjhāya naṭṭhenāti ca manasā
anya-e0501n0:154_1: ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā nijjhāyanaṭṭhena pekkhanaṭṭhena. Yathā hi issāso dūre ṭhatvā
anya-e0501n0:154_2: khuddake lakkhamaṇḍale saraṃ pavesento hatthehi saraṃ ujukañca niccalañca katvā maṇḍalañca
anya-e0501n0:154_3: vibhūtaṃ katvā cakkhunā nijjhāyanto paveseti. Evameva imehi aṅgehi cittaṃ ujukañca
anya-e0501n0:154_4: niccalañca katvā ārammaṇañca vibhūtaṃ katvā nijjhāyanto puggalo upanijjhāyatīti vuccati.
anya-e0501n0:154_5: Evaṃ upanijjhāyitvā yaṃkiñci kāyakammaṃ vā vacīkammaṃ vā manokammaṃ vā karonto avirajjhamāno karoti.
anya-e0501n0:155_0: Tattha kāyakammaṃ nāma abhikkamappaṭikkamādikaṃ vuccati. Vacīkammaṃ nāma akkharavaṇṇaparipuṇṇaṃ
anya-e0501n0:155_1: vacībhedakaraṇaṃ vuccati. Manokammaṃ nāma yaṃkiñci manasā ārammaṇavibhāvanaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0501n0:155_2: Dānakammaṃ vā pāṇātipāta kammaṃ vā anurūpehi jhānaṅgehi vinā dubbalena cittena kātuṃ
anya-e0501n0:155_3: na sakkā hoti. Esa nayo sesesu kusalākusala kammesūti.
anya-e0501n0:156_0: Ayañca attho vitakkādīnaṃ jhānaṅgadhammānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ sabhāva lakkhaṇehi dīpetabbo.
anya-e0501n0:156_1: Sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇābhiniropana lakkhaṇo vitakko, so cittaṃ ārammaṇe daḷhaṃ
anya-e0501n0:156_2: niyojeti. Ārammaṇānumajjanalakkhaṇo vicāro, so cittaṃ ārammaṇe daḷhaṃ saṃyojeti.
anya-e0501n0:156_3: Ārammaṇasampiyāyanalakkhaṇāpīti, sā cittaṃ ārammaṇe parituṭṭhaṃ karoti. Tissopi vedanā
anya-e0501n0:156_4: ārammaṇarasānu bhavanalakkhaṇā, tāpi cittaṃ ārammaṇe iṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattarasānubhavana
anya-e0501n0:156_5: kiccena daḷhappaṭibaddhaṃ karonti. Samādhānalakkhaṇā ekaggatā, sāpi cittaṃ ārammaṇe
anya-e0501n0:158_0: Dvādasa maggaṅgāni maggapaccayo sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammā vācā sammākammanto
anya-e0501n0:158_1: sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo
anya-e0501n0:158_2: micchāsamādhi. Sesā micchāvācā micchākammanto micchāājīvoti tayo dhammā visuṃ cetasikadhammā
anya-e0501n0:158_3: na honti. Musāvādādivasena pavattānaṃ catunnaṃ akusalakhandhānaṃ nāmaṃ. Tasmā te
anya-e0501n0:158_4: maggapaccaye visuṃ na gahitāti. Sabbe sahetukā citta cetasikadhammā ca sahetukacittasaha
anya-e0501n0:159_0: Kenaṭṭhena maggoti. Sugatiduggatinibbāna disādesasampā panaṭṭhena maggo. Sammādiṭṭhiādikāni
anya-e0501n0:159_1: hi aṭṭha sammāmaggaṅgāni sugati disādesañca nibbānadisādesañca sampāpanatthāya saṃvattanti.
anya-e0501n0:160_0: Tattha jhānapaccayo ārammaṇe cittaṃ ujuṃ karoti, thiraṃ karoti, appanāpattaṃ karoti.
anya-e0501n0:160_1: Appanāpattaṃ nāma gambhīre udake pakkhitto macchoviya kasiṇanimittādike nimittārammaṇe
anya-e0501n0:160_2: anupaviṭṭhaṃ cittaṃ pavuccati. Maggapaccayo vaṭṭapathe cetanākammaṃ vivaṭṭapathe
anya-e0501n0:160_3: bhāvanākammaṃ ujuṃ karoti, thiraṃ karoti, kammapathapattaṃ karoti, vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ
anya-e0501n0:160_4: vepullaṃ karoti, bhūmantarapattaṃ karoti. Aya metesaṃ dvinnaṃ paccayānaṃ viseso.
anya-e0501n0:161_0: Tattha kammapathapattaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīnaṃ kusalākusala kammānaṃ aṅgapāripūriyā
anya-e0501n0:161_1: paṭisandhijanane samatthabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ kammagatiṃ pattaṃ cetanākammaṃ. Bhūmantarapattaṃ
anya-e0501n0:161_2: nāma bhāvanānukkamena kāma bhūmito paṭṭhāya yāva lokuttarabhūmiyā ekasmiṃiriyāpathepi
anya-e0501n0:161_3: uparūparibhūmiṃ pattaṃ bhāvanākammaṃ. Ayañca attho jhānapaccaye vuttanayena sammādiṭṭhiādikānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:161_4: maggaṅgadhammānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ sabhāva lakkhaṇehi dīpetabboti. Maggapaccayadīpanā niṭṭhitā.
anya-e0501n0:163_0: Sampayuttapaccayo vippayuttapaccayoti ekaṃ dukkaṃ. Atthi paccayo natthi paccayoti
anya-e0501n0:163_1: ekaṃ dukkaṃ. Vigatapaccayo avigata paccayoti ekaṃ dukkaṃ. Imāni tīṇi paccayadukkāni
anya-e0501n0:163_2: visuṃ paccaya visesāni na honti. Pubbe āgatesu paccayesu keci paccayā attano paccayuppannehi
anya-e0501n0:163_3: sampayuttā hutvā paccayattaṃ gacchanti, keci vippayuttā hutvā, keci vijjamānā hutvā,
anya-e0501n0:163_4: keci avijjamānā hutvā, keci vigatā hutvā, keci avigatā hutvā paccayattaṃ gacchantīti
anya-e0501n0:164_0: Ettha ca atthīti kho kaccāna ayameko anto, natthīti kho dutiyo antoti evarūpesu ṭhānesu
anya-e0501n0:164_1: atthinatthisaddā sassatucchedesupavattanti, tasmā evarūpānaṃ atthānaṃ nivattanatthaṃ
anya-e0501n0:165: Sabbepi sahajātā cittacetasikā dhammā aññamaññassa paccayā ceva honti paccayuppannā ca.
anya-e0501n0:166: Kenaṭṭhena sampayutto. Ekuppādatā ekanirodhatā ekavatthukatā ekārammaṇatāti imehi catūhi sampayogaṅgehi samannāgato hutvā saṃyutto ekībhāvaṃ gatoti sampayutto.
anya-e0501n0:167_0: Tattha ekībhāvaṃ gatoti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ phassādīhi sattahi cetasikehi saha ekībhāvaṃ
anya-e0501n0:167_1: gataṃ hoti, dassananti ekaṃ vohāraṃ gacchati. Aṭṭha dhammā visuṃ visuṃ vohāraṃ na
anya-e0501n0:167_2: gacchanti, vinibbhujjitvā viññātuṃ na sakkoti. Esa nayo sesesu sabbacittuppādesūti.
anya-e0501n0:169: Catubbidho vippayuttapaccayo, sahajāto vatthupure jāto vatthārammaṇapurejāto pacchājātoti.
anya-e0501n0:170_0: Tattha sahajātavippayutto nāma dvisu sahajātapaccaya paccayuppannesu nāmarūpesu nāmaṃ
anya-e0501n0:170_1: vā rūpassa rūpaṃ vā nāmassa vippayuttaṃ hutvā paccayo. Tattha nāmanti pavattikāle
anya-e0501n0:170_2: catukkhandhanāmaṃ, rūpassāti cittajarūpassa, rūpanti paṭisandhikkhaṇe hadayavatthurūpaṃ,
anya-e0501n0:170_3: nāmassāti paṭisandhicatukkhandhanāmassa. Sesā tayopi vippayuttapaccayā pubbe vibhattā
anya-e0501n0:172_0: Sattavidho atthipaccayo, sahajātatthipaccayo vatthupure jātatthi paccayo ārammaṇapurejātatthipaccayo
anya-e0501n0:173: Tattha sahajātapaccayo eva sahajātatthipaccayo nāma. Esa nayo sesesu chasu. Paccayapaccayuppannavibhāgopi heṭṭhā tattha tattha vuttoyeva.
anya-e0501n0:174: Kenaṭṭhena atthipaccayo. Sayaṃ khaṇikapaccuppannatā saṅkhātena atthibhāvena paccuppannassa dhammassa paccayo atthipaccayo. Atthipaccayadīpanā niṭṭhitā.
anya-e0501n0:178_0: Sabbo anantarapaccayo natthi paccayo nāma. Tathā vigata paccayo. Avigatapaccayopi
anya-e0501n0:178_1: atthipaccayena sabbasadiso. Atthītica avigatoti ca atthato ekameva. Tathā natthīti
anya-e0501n0:181_0: Paccayasabhāgo vuccate. Pañcadasa sahajātajātikā honti, cattāro mahāsahajātā cattāro
anya-e0501n0:181_1: majjhimasahajātā satta khuddakasahajātā. Tattha cattāro mahāsahajātā nāma sahajāto
anya-e0501n0:181_2: sahajātanissayo sahajātatthi sahajāta avigato. Cattāro majjhimasahajātā nāma aññamañño
anya-e0501n0:181_3: vipāko sampayutto sahajātavippayutto. Satta khuddakasaha jātā nāma hetu sahajātādhipati
anya-e0501n0:181_4: sahajātakammaṃ saha jātāhāro sahajātindriyaṃ jhānaṃ maggo.
anya-e0501n0:182: Tayo rūpāhārā, rūpāhāro rūpāhāratthi rūpāhārā vigato.
anya-e0501n0:184_0: Sattarasa purejātajātikā honti, cha vatthupurejātā cha ārammaṇapurejātā pañca vatthārammaṇapurejātā.
anya-e0501n0:184_1: Tattha cha vatthupurejātā nāma vatthupurejāto vatthupurejātanissayo vatthupurejātindriyaṃ
anya-e0501n0:184_2: vatthupurejātavippayuttaṃ vatthupurejātatthi vatthu purejātaavigato. Cha ārammaṇapurejātā
anya-e0501n0:184_3: nāma ārammaṇa purejāto kiñciārammaṇaṃ koci ārammaṇādhipati koci ārammaṇūpanissaso
anya-e0501n0:184_4: ārammaṇapurejātatthi ārammaṇapurejāta avigato. Kiñci ārammaṇantiādīsu kiñcikocivacanehi
anya-e0501n0:184_5: paccuppannaṃ nipphannarūpaṃ gayhati. Pañca vatthārammaṇapurejātā nāma vatthārammaṇa
anya-e0501n0:184_6: purejāto vatthārammaṇapurejātanissayo vatthārammaṇapure jāta vippayutto vatthārammaṇapurejātatthi
anya-e0501n0:185: Cattāro pacchājātajātikā honti, pacchājāto pacchājātavippayutto pacchājātatthi pacchājātaavigato.
anya-e0501n0:186_0: Satta anantarā honti, anantaro samanantaro anantarūpa nissayo āsevanaṃ anantarakammaṃ
anya-e0501n0:186_1: natthi vigato. Ettha ca anantara kammaṃ nāma ariyamaggacetanā, sā attano anantare ariyaphalaṃ janeti.
anya-e0501n0:187_0: Pañca visuṃ paccayā honti, avasesaṃ ārammaṇaṃ avaseso ārammaṇādhipati avaseso ārammaṇūpa
anya-e0501n0:187_1: nissayo sabbo pakatūpanissayo avasesaṃ nānākkhaṇika kammaṃ. Iti vitthārato paṭṭhānapaccayā
anya-e0501n0:188_0: Tattha sabbe sahajātajātikā ca sabbe purejāta jātikā sabbe pacchājātajātikā rūpāhāro
anya-e0501n0:188_1: rūpajīvitindriyanti ime paccuppannapaccayā nāma. Sabbe anantarajātikā sabbaṃ nānākkhaṇika
anya-e0501n0:188_2: kammanti ime atītapaccayā nāma. Ārammaṇaṃ pakatūpanissayoti ime tekālikā ca nibbānapaññattīnaṃ
anya-e0501n0:189_0: Nibbānañca paññatti cāti ime dve dhammā appaccayā nāma asaṅkhatā nāma. Kasmā. Ajātikattā.
anya-e0501n0:189_1: Yesañhi jāti nāma atthi, uppādo nāma atthi. Te sappaccayānāma saṅkhatā nāma paṭiccasamuppannā
anya-e0501n0:189_2: nāma. Ime dve dhammā ajātikattā anuppādattā ajātipaccayattāca appaccayā nāma asaṅkhatā nāmāti.
anya-e0501n0:190_0: Sappaccayesu ca dhammesu saṅkhatesu ekopi dhammo nicco dhuvo sassato aviparītadhammo
anya-e0501n0:190_1: nāma natthi. Atha kho sabbe te khayaṭṭhena aniccā eva honti. Kasmā. Sayañca paccayāyattavutti
anya-e0501n0:190_2: kattā paccayānañca aniccadhammattā. Nanu nibbānañca paññatti ca paccayā honti. Te
anya-e0501n0:190_3: ca niccā dhuvāti. Saccaṃ. Kevalena pana nibbānapaccayena vā paññattipaccayena vā
anya-e0501n0:190_4: uppanno nāma natthi, bahūhi paccayehi eva uppanno, te pana paccayā aniccā eva adhuvāti.
anya-e0501n0:191_0: Ye ca dhammā aniccā honti, te niccakālaṃ satte tividhehi dukkhadaṇḍehi paṭippīḷenti
anya-e0501n0:191_1: bādhenti, tasmā te dhammā bhayaṭṭhena dukkhā eva honti. Tattha tividhā dukkhadaṇḍā
anya-e0501n0:192_0: Ye keci aniccā eva honti, ekasmiṃ iriyāpathepi punappunaṃ bhijjanti, te kathaṃ yāvajīvaṃ
anya-e0501n0:192_1: niccasaññitānaṃ sattapuggalānaṃ attā nāma bhaveyyuṃ, sārā nāma bhaveyyuṃ. Ye ca dukkhā
anya-e0501n0:192_2: eva honti, te kathaṃ dukkhappaṭikulānaṃ sukhakāmānaṃ sattānaṃ attā nāma bhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0501n0:192_3: sārā nāma bhaveyyuṃ. Tasmā te dhammā asārakaṭṭhena anattā eva honti.
anya-e0501n0:193_0: Api ca yasmā imāya catuvīsatiyā paccayadesanāya imamatthaṃ dasseti. Sabbepi saṅkhatadhammā
anya-e0501n0:193_1: nāma paccayāyattavuttikā eva honti, sattānaṃ vasāyattavuttikā na honti. Paccayāyatta
anya-e0501n0:193_2: vuttikesu ca tesu na ekopi dhammo appakena paccayena uppajjati. Atha kho bahūhi eva
anya-e0501n0:193_3: paccayehi uppajjatīti, tasmā ayaṃ desanā dhammānaṃ anattalakkhaṇadīpane matthakapattā hotīti.
anya-e0501n0:197_0: Paccayaghaṭanānayo vuccate. Ekekasmiṃ paccayuppanne bahunnaṃ paccayānaṃ samodhānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:197_1: paccayaghaṭanā nāma. Yena pana dhammā sappaccayā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannāti vuccanti,
anya-e0501n0:197_2: sabbe te dhammā uppāde ca ṭhitiyañca imehi catuvīsatiyā paccayehi sahitattā sappaccayā
anya-e0501n0:197_3: nāma, sappaccayattā saṅkhatā nāma, saṅkhatattā paṭiccasamuppannā nāma. Katame pana
anya-e0501n0:197_4: te dhammāti. Ekavīsasatacittāni ca dvipaññāsacetasikāni ca aṭṭhavīsati rūpāni ca.
anya-e0501n0:198_0: Tattha ekavīsasatacittāni dhātuvasena sattavidhāni bhavanti, cakkhu viññāṇadhātu
anya-e0501n0:198_1: sotaviññāṇadhātu ghānaviññāṇadhātu jitha viññāṇadhātu kāyaviññāṇadhātu manodhātu
anya-e0501n0:198_2: manoviññāṇa dhātūti. Tattha cakkhuviññāṇadvayaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātu nāma. Sotaviññāṇadvayaṃ
anya-e0501n0:198_3: sotaviññāṇadhātu nāma. Ghānaviññāṇadvayaṃ ghānaviññāṇadhātu nāma. Jithaviññāṇadvayaṃ
anya-e0501n0:198_4: jithaviññāṇadhātu nāma. Kāyaviññāṇadvayaṃ kāyaviññāṇadhātu nāma. Pañcadvārāvajjana
anya-e0501n0:198_5: cittañca sampaṭicchanacittadvayañca manodhātu nāma. Sesāni aṭṭhasataṃ cittāni manoviññāṇadhātu nāma.
anya-e0501n0:199: Dvipaññāsacetasikāni ca rāsivasena catubbidhāni bhavanti, satta sabbacittikāni ca cha pakiṇṇakāni ca cuddasa pāpānica pañcavīsati kalyāṇāni ca.
anya-e0501n0:200_0: Catuvīsatipaccayesu ca pannarasapaccayā sabbacittuppāda sādhāraṇā honti, ārammaṇañca
anya-e0501n0:200_1: anantarañca samanantarañca saha jāto ca aññamaññañca nissayo ca upanissayo ca kammañca
anya-e0501n0:200_2: āhāro ca indriyañca sampayutto ca atthi ca natthi ca vigato ca avigato ca. Na hi
anya-e0501n0:200_3: kiñci cittaṃ vā cetasikaṃ vā ārammaṇena vinā uppannaṃ nāma atthi. Tathā anantarādīhi
anya-e0501n0:200_4: ca. Aṭṭhapaccayā kesañci cittuppādānaṃ paccayā sādhāraṇā honti, hetu ca adhipati
anya-e0501n0:200_5: ca pure jāto ca āsevanañca vipāko ca jhānañca maggo ca vippayutto ca. Tattha hetu
anya-e0501n0:200_6: sahetukacittuppādānaṃ eva sādhāraṇā, adhipati ca sādhipatijavanānaṃ eva, purejāto
anya-e0501n0:200_7: ca kesañci cittuppādānaṃ eva, āsevanañca kusalākusalakiriyajavanānaṃ eva, vipāko
anya-e0501n0:200_8: ca vipākacittuppādānaṃ eva, jhānañca manodhātu manoviññāṇadhātu cittuppādānaṃ eva,
anya-e0501n0:200_9: maggo ca sahetukacittuppādānaṃ eva, vippayutto ca arūpaloke cittuppādānaṃ natthi,
anya-e0501n0:200_10: eko pacchājāto rūpadhammānaṃ eva visuṃbhūto hoti.
anya-e0501n0:201_0: Tatrāyaṃ dīpanā. Satta sabbacittikāni cetasikāni nāma, phasso vedanā saññā cetanā
anya-e0501n0:201_1: ekaggatā jīvitaṃ manasikāro. Tattha cittaṃ adhipatijātikañca āhārapaccayo ca indriyapaccayo
anya-e0501n0:201_2: ca. Phasso āhārapaccayo. Vedanā indriyapaccayo ca jhāna paccayo ca. Cetanā kammapaccayo
anya-e0501n0:201_3: ca āhārapaccayo ca. Ekaggatā indriyapaccayo ca jhāna paccayo ca maggapaccayo ca.
anya-e0501n0:201_4: Jīvitaṃ indriyapaccayo. Sesā dve dhammā visesapaccayā na honti.
anya-e0501n0:202_0: Cakkhuviññāṇe satta sabbacittikāni cetasikāni labbhanti, viññāṇena saddhiṃ aṭṭha
anya-e0501n0:202_1: nāmadhammā honti. Sabbe te dhammā sattahi paccayehi aññamaññassa paccayā honti catūhi
anya-e0501n0:202_2: mahāsahajātehi ca vippayuttavajjitehi tīhi majjhimasahajātehi ca. Tesveva aṭṭhasu
anya-e0501n0:202_3: dhammesu viññāṇaṃ sesānaṃ sattannaṃ dhammānaṃ āhārapaccayena ca indriyapaccayena
anya-e0501n0:202_4: ca paccayo hoti. Phasso āhārapaccayena, vedanā indriyapaccayamattena, cetanā kammapaccayena
anya-e0501n0:202_5: ca āhāra paccayena ca, ekaggatā indriyapaccayamattena, jīvitaṃ sesānaṃ sattannaṃ
anya-e0501n0:202_6: dhammānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo hoti. Cakkhuvatthurūpaṃ pana tesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:202_7: chahi vatthupurejātehi tasmiṃ cakkhuvatthumhi āpātamāgatāni paccuppannāni rūpārammaṇāni
anya-e0501n0:202_8: tesaṃ catūhi ārammaṇa purejātehi, anantaraniruddhaṃ pañcadvārāvajjanacittañca pañcahi
anya-e0501n0:202_9: anantarehi, pubbe kataṃ kusalakammaṃ vā akusalakammaṃ vā kusalavipākānaṃ vā akusalavipākānaṃ
anya-e0501n0:202_10: vā tesaṃ nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena, kamma sahāyabhūtāni purimabhave avijjātaṇhūpādānāni
anya-e0501n0:202_11: ca imasmiṃ bhave āvāsapuggalautubhojanādayo ca tesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ dhammānaṃ pakatūpanissayapaccayena
anya-e0501n0:202_12: paccayā honti. Imasmiṃ citte hetu ca adhipati ca pacchājāto ca āsevanañca jhānañca
anya-e0501n0:202_13: maggocāti chapaccayā na labbhanti, aṭṭhārasapaccayā labbhanti. Yathā ca imasmiṃ citte,
anya-e0501n0:202_14: tathā sotaviññāṇādīsupi cha paccayā na labbhanti, aṭṭhārasapaccayā labbhantīti.
anya-e0501n0:205_0: Cha pakiṇṇakāni cetasikāni nāma, vitakko vicāro adhimokkho vīriyaṃ pīti chando. Tattha
anya-e0501n0:205_1: vitakko jhānapaccayo ca maggapaccayo ca. Vicāro jhānapaccayo. Vīriyaṃ adhipatijātikañca
anya-e0501n0:205_2: indriyapaccayo ca maggapaccayo ca. Pīti jhānapaccayo. Chando adhipatijātiko. Adhimokkho
anya-e0501n0:206_1: pañcasu cittesu dasa cetasikāni labbhanti, satta sabba cittikāni ca pakiṇṇakesu vitakko
anya-e0501n0:206_2: ca vicāro ca adhimokkho ca. Viññāṇena saddhiṃ paccekaṃ ekādasa nāmadhammā honti.
anya-e0501n0:206_3: Imesu cittesu jhānakiccaṃ labbhati. Vedanā ca ekaggatā ca vitakko ca vicāro ca jhānapaccayaṃ
anya-e0501n0:206_4: sādhenti. Pañcadvārāvajjanacittaṃ pana kiriyacittaṃ hoti, vipākapaccayo natthi. Nānākkhaṇikakammañca
anya-e0501n0:206_5: upanissayaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Vipākapaccayena saddhiṃ cha paccayā na labbhanti. Jhānapaccayena
anya-e0501n0:206_6: saddhiṃ aṭṭhārasapaccayā labbhanti. Sesesu catūsu vipākacittesu pañca paccayā na
anya-e0501n0:206_7: labbhanti. Vipākapaccayena ca jhānapaccayena ca saddhiṃ ekūnavīsati paccayā labbhanti.
anya-e0501n0:207_0: Somanassasantīraṇe pītiyā saddhiṃ ekādasacetasikā yujjanti, manodvārāvajjanacitte
anya-e0501n0:207_1: ca vīriyena saddhiṃ ekādasāti viññāṇena saddhiṃ dvādasa nāmadhammā honti. Hasituppādacitte
anya-e0501n0:207_2: pana pītiyā ca vīriyena ca saddhiṃ dvādasa cetasikāni yujjanti. Viññāṇena saddhiṃ
anya-e0501n0:207_3: terasa nāmadhammā honti. Tattha somanassasantīraṇe jhānaṅgesu pītimattaṃ adhikaṃ
anya-e0501n0:207_4: hoti, pubbe upekkhāsantīraṇadvaye viya pañcapaccayā na labbhanti. Ekūnavīsatipaccayā
anya-e0501n0:207_5: labbhanti. Manodvārā vajjanacitte ca vīriyamattaṃ adhikaṃ hoti, tañca indriyakicca
anya-e0501n0:207_6: jhāna kiccānisādheti. Adhipatikiccañca maggakiccañca na sādheti. Kiriya cittattāvipākapaccayo
anya-e0501n0:207_7: ca natthi. Pubbe pañcadvārāvajjanacitte viya vipāka paccayena saddhiṃ cha paccayā
anya-e0501n0:207_8: na labbhanti. Jhānapaccayena saddhiṃ aṭṭharasa paccayā labbhanti. Hasituppādacittepi
anya-e0501n0:207_9: kiriyacittattā vipākapaccayo natthi, javanacittattā pana āsevanaṃ atthi, vipākapaccayena
anya-e0501n0:207_10: saddhiṃ pañca paccayā na labbhanti. Āsevanapaccayena saddhiṃ ekūnavīsati paccayā labbhanti.
anya-e0501n0:210_0: Dvādasa akusalacittāni, dve mohamūlikāni aṭṭha lobha mūlikāni dve dosamūlikāni. Cuddasa
anya-e0501n0:210_1: pāpacetasikāni nāma moho ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ uddhaccanti idaṃ mohacatukkaṃ nāma.
anya-e0501n0:210_2: Lobho diṭṭhi mānoti idaṃ lobhatikkaṃ nāma. Doso issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccanti idaṃ
anya-e0501n0:210_3: dosacatukkaṃ nāma. Thinaṃ middhaṃ vicikicchāti idaṃ visuṃ tikkaṃ nāma.
anya-e0501n0:211: Tattha lobho doso mohoti tayo mūladhammā hetupaccayā, diṭṭhi maggapaccayo, sesā dasadhammā visesapaccayā na honti.
anya-e0501n0:212_0: Tattha dve mohamūlikāni nāma vicikicchāsampayuttacittaṃ uddhacca sampayuttacittaṃ.
anya-e0501n0:212_1: Tattha vicikicchāsampayuttacitte pannarasa cetasikāni uppajjanti satta sabbacittikāni
anya-e0501n0:212_2: ca vitakko vicāro vīriyanti tīṇi pakiṇṇakāni ca pāpacetasikesu mohacatukkañca vicikicchā
anya-e0501n0:212_3: cāti, cittena saddhiṃ soḷasa nāmadhammā honti. Imasmiṃ citte hetu paccayopi maggapaccayopi
anya-e0501n0:212_4: labbhanti. Tattha moho hetupaccayo, vitakko ca vīriyañca maggapaccayo, ekaggatā pana
anya-e0501n0:212_5: vicikicchāya duṭṭhattā imasmiṃ citte indriyakiccañca maggakiccañca na sādheti, jhānakiccamattaṃ
anya-e0501n0:212_6: sādheti. Adhipati ca pacchājāto vipāko cāti tayo paccayāna labbhanti, sesā ekavīsatipaccayā
anya-e0501n0:212_7: labbhanti. Uddhaccasampayuttacittepi vicikicchaṃ pahāya adhimokkhena saddhiṃ pannaraseva
anya-e0501n0:212_8: cetasikāni, soḷaseva nāmadhammā honti. Imasmiṃ citte ekaggatā indriya kiccañca jhānakiccañca
anya-e0501n0:212_9: maggakiccañca sādheti, tayo paccayā na labbhanti, ekavīsati paccayā labbhanti.
anya-e0501n0:213_0: Aṭṭhasu lobhamūlikacittesu pana satta sabbacittikāni ca cha pakiṇṇakāni ca pāpesu
anya-e0501n0:213_1: mohacatukkañca lobhatikkañca thinamiddhañcāti dvāvīsati cetasikāni uppajjanti. Tesu
anya-e0501n0:213_2: lobho ca mohocāti dve mūlāni hetupaccayo. Chando ca cittañca vīriyañcāti tayo adhipatijātikā
anya-e0501n0:213_3: kadāci adhipatikiccaṃ sādhenti, ārammaṇādhipatipi ettha labbhati. Cetanā kammapaccayo.
anya-e0501n0:213_4: Tayo āhārā āhārapaccayo. Cittañca vedanā ca ekaggatā ca jīvitañca vīriyañcāti pañca
anya-e0501n0:213_5: indriyadhammā indriyapaccayo. Vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca vedanā ca ekaggatācāti
anya-e0501n0:213_6: pañca jhānaṅgāni jhānapaccayo. Vitakko ca ekaggatā ca diṭṭhi ca vīriyañcāti cattāri
anya-e0501n0:213_7: maggaṅgāni maggapaccayo. Pacchājāto ca vipāko cāti dve paccayā na labbhanti. Sesā
anya-e0501n0:214_0: Dvīsu dosamūlikacittesu pītiñca lobhatikkañca pahāya dosacatukkena saddhiṃ dvāvīsati
anya-e0501n0:214_1: eva cetasikāni, doso ca moho ca dve mūlāni, tayo adhipati jātikā, tayo āhārā, pañca
anya-e0501n0:214_2: indriyāni, cattāri jhānaṅgāni, tīṇi maggaṅgāni. Etthāpi dve paccayā na labbhanti,
anya-e0501n0:217_0: Ekanavuti sobhaṇacittāni nāma, catuvīsati kāma sobhaṇacittāni pannarasa rūpacittāni
anya-e0501n0:217_1: dvādasa arūpacittāni cattālīsa lokuttaracittāni. Tattha catuvīsati kāmasobhaṇa cittāni
anya-e0501n0:217_2: nāma aṭṭha kāmakusalacittāni aṭṭha kāmasobhaṇavipāka cittāni aṭṭha kāmasobhaṇakiriyacittāni.
anya-e0501n0:218_0: Pañca vīsati kalyāṇacetasikāni nāma, alobho adoso amohoceti tīṇi kalyāṇamūlikāni
anya-e0501n0:218_1: ca saddhā ca sati ca hirī ca ottappañca tatramajjhattatā ca kāyapassaddhi ca citta
anya-e0501n0:218_2: passaddhi ca kāyalahutā ca cittalahutā ca kāyamudutā ca citta mudutā ca kāyakammaññatā
anya-e0501n0:218_3: ca citta kammaññatā ca kāyapāguññatā ca cittapāguññatā ca kāyujukatā ca cittujukatā
anya-e0501n0:218_4: ca sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvoti tisso viratiyo ca karuṇā muditāti dve appamaññāyo ca.
anya-e0501n0:219_0: Tattha tīṇi kalyāṇamūlāni hetupaccayo, amoho pana adhipatipaccaye vīmaṃsādhipatināma,
anya-e0501n0:219_1: indriyapaccaye paññindriyaṃ nāma, maggapaccaye sammādiṭṭhi nāma. Saddhā indriyapaccaye
anya-e0501n0:219_2: saddhindriyaṃ nāma. Sati indriyapaccaye satindriyaṃ nāma, maggapaccaye sammāsati
anya-e0501n0:219_3: nāma. Tisso viratiyo maggapaccayo, sesā sattarasa dhammā visesapaccayā na honti.
anya-e0501n0:220_0: Aṭṭhasu kāmakusalacittesu aṭṭhatiṃsa cetasikāni saṅgayhanti, satta sabbacittikāni
anya-e0501n0:220_1: cha pakiṇṇakāni pañcavīsati kalyāṇāni. Tesu ca pīti catūsu somanassikesu eva, amoho
anya-e0501n0:220_2: catūsu ñāṇasampayuttesu eva, tisso viratiyo sikkhāpadasīlapūraṇa kāle eva, dve appamaññāyo
anya-e0501n0:220_3: sattesu kāruññamodanākāresu evāti. Imesupi aṭṭhasu cittesu dve vā tīṇi vā kalyāṇamūlāni
anya-e0501n0:220_4: hetupaccayo, chando ca cittañca vīriyañca vīmaṃsācāti catūsu adhipatijātikesu ekamekova
anya-e0501n0:220_5: kadāci adhipatipaccayo. Cetanā kammapaccayo. Tayo āhārā āhārapaccayo. Cittañca vedanā
anya-e0501n0:220_6: ca ekaggatā ca jīvitañca saddhā ca sati ca vīriyañca paññācāti aṭṭha indriyāni indriyapaccayo.
anya-e0501n0:220_7: Vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca vedanā ca ekaggatācāti pañcajhānaṅgāni jhānapaccayo.
anya-e0501n0:220_8: Paññā ca vitakko ca tisso viratiyo ca sati ca vīriyañca ekaggatācāti aṭṭha maggaṅgāni
anya-e0501n0:220_9: maggapaccayo. Imesupi aṭṭhasu cittesu pacchājāto ca vipākocāti dve paccayā na labbhanti,
anya-e0501n0:221: Aṭṭhasu kāmasobhaṇakiriyacittesu tisso viratiyo na labbhanti, kusalesu viya dve paccayā na labbhanti, dvāvīsati paccayā labbhanti.
anya-e0501n0:222: Aṭṭhasu kāmasobhaṇavipākesu tisso viratiyo ca dve appamaññāyo ca na labbhanti. Adhipatipaccayo ca pacchājāto ca āsevanañcāti tayo paccayā na labbhanti, ekavīsati paccayā labbhanti.
anya-e0501n0:223: Upari rūpārūpalokuttaracittesupi dvāvīsatipaccayato atirekaṃ natthi. Tasmā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakāmakusala cittesu viya imesu paccayaghaṭanā veditabbā.
anya-e0501n0:224_0: Evaṃ sante kasmā tāni cittāni kāmacittato mahanta tarāni ca paṇītatarāni ca hontīti.
